T02D1419:134b-36: pa rnams kyis snying gar nyi ma dang chu skyes
T02D1419:134b-37: kyi dbus su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1419:134b-38: ye shes kyi sa bon zhes bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge'o //
T02D1419:134b-39: rang byung la sogs zhes bya ba ni ji ltar
T02D1419:134b-40: 'ga' zhig tu yang rab tu 'bar bar song ba
T02D1419:135a-1: ni sdong bu dang me tsam gyis slar yang 'bar ro //
T02D1419:135a-2: de bzhin du dga' ba dang bcas pa'i sems kyi
T02D1419:135a-3: bde ba tsam gang yin pa de sems kyis bon
T02D1419:135a-4: te ye shes kyi rnam pa las byung bas rang
T02D1419:135a-5: byung zhes bya ba ste thig le bzhi bsdus pa
T02D1419:135a-6: de'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:135a-7: de ltar tshangs pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang gi
T02D1419:135a-8: sems ye shes dang shes bya'i gzugs su zhugs pa
T02D1419:135a-9: ste / sngon gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes su yang ngo //
T02D1419:135a-10: slar yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sa bon de'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba spro ba ste /
T02D1419:135a-11: sna tshogs pa'i kha dog ni kha dog lnga la
T02D1419:135a-12: sogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' gang bar bgyis pa
T02D1419:135a-14: de rnams kyis yang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs
T02D1419:135a-15: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs
T02D1419:135a-16: pa'i dra ba spyan drangs te /
T02D1419:135a-17: lha zhes bya ba ni he ru ka la sogs
T02D1419:135a-18: pa rnams kyi rjes su dpa' bo yang spyan drang
T02D1419:135a-19: ba nyid do // nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:135a-20: mchod pa byas pa'i de ma thag tu de de
T02D1419:135a-22: bdud rtsi rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni bi mu shu ra ma zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:135a-23: de yang zla ba dang nyi ma shar ba las
T02D1419:135a-24: skyes pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni srog dang
T02D1419:135a-25: thur sel rnam par bzung bas khams thams cad zhu
T02D1419:135a-26: ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs la mchod par
T02D1419:135a-27: bya'o // sdig pa bshags pa sogs zhes bya ba
T02D1419:135a-28: ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun
T02D1419:135a-30: de yang sdig pa bshags pa dang mi byed pa'i sdom pa dang /
T02D1419:135a-31: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1419:135a-33: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1419:135a-34: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1419:135a-36: slar yang snying rje la sogs pa ni byams pa
T02D1419:135a-37: dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms rjes su dran par
T02D1419:135a-38: bya'o // stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyang //
T02D1419:135a-40: aom sarba dharm'a: sh'u n+ya t'a sv'a bh'a ba sh'u & o& ham /
T02D1419:135a-41: aom sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a ba shu ddho& ham /
T02D1419:135a-42: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1419:135a-43: zhes bya ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1419:135a-44: de bzhin du aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dha rm'a yog shuddho& ham /
T02D1419:135a-46: de'i rjes su sa bon lnga //
T02D1419:135a-47: zhes bya ba ni yam ram bam lam sum phyi
T02D1419:135a-48: rol la sogs par yongs su bskor nas zlum por
T02D1419:135b-0: @135b te rlung dang me dang chu dang dbang chen
T02D1419:135b-1: gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang ri rab kyi dbus su
T02D1419:135b-3: de ltar de'i rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa
T02D1419:135b-4: sprul par bya zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa khang
T02D1419:135b-5: pa brtsegs pa ste des tu'i yi ge ni nges
T02D1419:135b-6: par gzung ba'o // gcig ces bya ba ni gsal
T02D1419:135b-7: bas ri rab kyi steng las spros pas sa'i mthil
T02D1419:135b-8: dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1419:135b-9: de ltar tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis rdo rje 'chang gi las kyi rang bzhin du gsungs pa /
T02D1419:135b-10: 'od zer spro ba'i phyir gzhal med khang na spyod
T02D1419:135b-11: pa rnams kyi sems rnams la rab tu 'jug par
T02D1419:135b-12: 'gyur ro // de rnams kyi ye shes bkug nas
T02D1419:135b-13: de'i tshe bar snang la sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1419:135b-14: kyi ye shes spro ba'i sbyor bas ye shes kyi
T02D1419:135b-15: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis te mtha'
T02D1419:135b-16: med pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bzhugs pa'i
T02D1419:135b-18: de rnams lan cig tu byas nas dbang du bya ba dang bkug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:135b-19: gzhal med khang na spyod pa rnams kyis 'di sems bskyed par 'gyur te /
T02D1419:135b-20: tshang pa gcig pa gzhal yas khang gi ste ngan gnas pa bltas nas /
T02D1419:135b-21: des 'di'i skad cig la rang nyid mya ngan las 'da' ste de la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:135b-22: nam mkha'i khongs yongs su bkang nas de'i dbus su
T02D1419:135b-23: gnas pa yod pa na rang gi snang bas ye
T02D1419:135b-24: shes dang shes bya gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i bdag po'i
T02D1419:135b-25: gzugs rang bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1419:135b-26: to // de ltar bdud rtsi la sogs pa lnga
T02D1419:135b-27: rnams kyis dang de bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa
T02D1419:135b-28: la sogs pa bdun rnams kyis dang /
T02D1419:135b-29: snying rje la sogs pa bzhin rnams kyis dang de
T02D1419:135b-30: bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi
T02D1419:135b-31: rnams kyis dang sa bon lnga rnams kyis kyang de
T02D1419:135b-32: kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rgyu'o //
T02D1419:135b-33: de yang l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'ur gsungs te
T02D1419:135b-34: rang bzhin gyi skyes bu la sogs pa nas stong
T02D1419:135b-35: pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1419:135b-37: de ltar rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:135b-38: sogs pa dang g-yon dang g-yas pa'i zhes bya ba'i
T02D1419:135b-39: bar du bsgom pa la sngon du bshad pa'i bar
T02D1419:136a-1: gnas pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa
T02D1419:136a-2: gzhal yas khang rnams su gzugs brnyan ye shes kyi
T02D1419:136a-3: gzugs tshangs pa la sogs par son pa rnams de'i
T02D1419:136a-4: tshe nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1419:136a-5: ro zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D1419:136a-6: spangs pa'o // de ltar rdo rje 'chang gi mdog
T02D1419:136a-7: dang mtshon cha de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro
T02D1419:136a-8: spangs pa'o // // de ltar 'dab ma bzhi bcu
T02D1419:136a-9: rtsa brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa nas bsgom
T02D1419:136a-10: pa'i nyi ma can zhes bya ba'i bar des 'di
T02D1419:136a-11: spangs pa'o // // skad bshad de / padma dang
T02D1419:136a-12: ri rab kyi steng gi cha 'khor lo bcu gnyis
T02D1419:136a-13: rnams su de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul
T02D1419:136a-14: 'khor gyi 'khor lo rim pa ji lta bu rnams
T02D1419:136a-15: su gnas nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:136a-16: 'khor lo'i rva bar ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:136a-17: gnya' shing 'dzin dang padmar ni phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-18: zla ba'i gling du ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-19: sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtshor phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-20: gshol mda' 'dzin dang dkar po'i gling du bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-21: mar gyi rgya mtsho dang seng ldeng can gyi rir phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-22: ku sha'i gling du bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-23: zho'o rgya mtsho dang blta na sdug gi rir phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-24: mi'am ci'i gling du bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-25: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang rta rna can gyi rir phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-26: krung krung gi gling du bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-27: chu'i rgya tsho dang dul ba'i rir phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-28: drag po'i gling du bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1419:136a-29: chang gi rgya mtsho dang gangs can gyi rir phag mo'o //
T02D1419:136a-30: 'dzam bu'i gling du bcom ldan 'das te de bzhin
T02D1419:136a-31: du ba tshva can dang zho dang med dang rlung
T02D1419:136a-32: dang nam mkhas bskor ba rnams su bcom ldan 'das
T02D1419:136a-33: so // phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas la bor
T02D1419:136a-34: lo'i rva ba dang rdo rje'i ri'i zhes bya ba
T02D1419:136a-35: so // ni nges pa'o // de ltar dpal he
T02D1419:136a-36: ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo nyi
T02D1419:136a-37: shu rtsa bzhi zhes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:136a-38: snying rje dang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang
T02D1419:136a-39: ye shes dang shes byar shes par bya'o //
T02D1419:136a-40: de ltar 'khor lo'i rva ba la sogs pa gnas nyi shu rtsa drug rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1419:136a-41: de ltar gri gug ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1419:136a-42: ri la sogs pa 'di rnams thams cad kyi bar
T02D1419:136a-43: mtshams rnams su shes par bya ste /
T02D1419:136b-0: lhag @136b ma rnams la ri mo lnga lnga la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1419:136b-1: yang na gri gug ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1419:136b-2: zhags pa dang lcags kyu spangs la gnas bcu gcig
T02D1419:136b-4: de bzhin du sgo bcu drug rnams kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams 'chad do //
T02D1419:136b-5: de bzhin du rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang gis gnyis gsum
T02D1419:136b-6: bzhi dang ri mo lnga rnams kyis gzugs med pa'i
T02D1419:136b-7: khams ye shes lnga'i rnam pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1419:136b-8: de ltar yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom pa'i
T02D1419:136b-9: dus rnams su yongs su gyur zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:136b-10: sogs pas rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang rang dang 'dra ba'i
T02D1419:136b-11: shes rab dang thabs kyi lhan cig tu zhu bar
T02D1419:136b-12: gyur nas sa bon du gyur pa'i gnas skabs su
T02D1419:136b-13: gyur to // des de ltar rdzogs pa ni dkyil
T02D1419:136b-14: 'khor gyi 'khor lo gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams
T02D1419:136b-15: kyis lhan cig bzhis lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i bdag nyid
T02D1419:136b-16: can bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ste 'char par
T02D1419:136b-18: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D1419:136b-19: khams kyi sems can gyi 'jig rten bskyed par ri
T02D1419:136b-20: rab kyi steng du tshangs ba la sogs pa rtsen
T02D1419:136b-22: sa gzhi'i mthil du yang zhes bya ba ni sngon
T02D1419:136b-23: du bshad pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1419:136b-24: mchod pa byas nas de bzhin du lang sngon gyi
T02D1419:136b-25: lha bshos dbul ba'i sa'i steng du bdud rtsi zhu
T02D1419:136b-26: ba'i gzugs kyis rnams par gnas pa'o //
T02D1419:136b-27: de'i bdud rtsi myang bas lha de nam mkha'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
T02D1419:136b-28: der de ltar bdud rtsi'i dbus su rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
T02D1419:136b-29: rang gi 'od mi snang bar song ba rnams sems med par rnam par gnas so //
T02D1419:136b-30: slar yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rnam par shes
T02D1419:136b-31: pa rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang yongs su gyur pa yod
T02D1419:136b-32: pas dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyis kyang stong pa
T02D1419:136b-33: nyid kyi gzugs su gyur to //
T02D1419:136b-34: de rnams kyis kyang glu rnams kyis rtag tu zhes bya ba ni snying rje dang /
T02D1419:136b-37: btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1419:136b-38: kyis sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis rab tu
T02D1419:137a-1: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:137a-2: rkang pa bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rnams kyis te /
T02D1419:137a-3: khyab bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba mgron 'bod na //
T02D1419:137a-4: zhes bya ba ni kye khyab bdag 'gro ba snying rje'i ros khyod kyis mgron du pos pa ste /
T02D1419:137a-5: khyod ni ci'i phyir stong pa nyid du bzhugs zhes
T02D1419:137a-6: bya ba ste ci'i don du khyod stong pa nyid
T02D1419:137a-7: la rab tu zhugs par gyur /
T02D1419:137a-8: de'i phyir bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1419:137a-9: te zhes bya ba ni bzhengs shig stong pa nyid
T02D1419:137a-10: kyi ting nge 'dzin spongs la bdag bdag cag snying
T02D1419:137a-11: rje'i rang bzhin can ma rnams kyis sems can gyi
T02D1419:137a-14: bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes bdag la 'dod pa mdzod //
T02D1419:137a-16: bde ba chen po'i kye mgon po rdo rje 'chang
T02D1419:137a-17: mchog tu zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan
T02D1419:137a-18: pas bdag la 'dod pa gyis rol par gyis te
T02D1419:137a-19: rang gi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzod ces bya ba'i
T02D1419:137a-20: don to // slar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1419:137a-21: gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub //
T02D1419:137a-22: ces bya ba ni kye khyab bdag cag snying rje'i
T02D1419:137a-23: rang bzhin can ma rnams kyi bdag gson cig khyod
T02D1419:137a-24: kyis gcig tu na stong pa nyid la zhugs pa
T02D1419:137a-25: tsam ma yin gyi gzhan rnams khams gsum gyi sems
T02D1419:137a-26: can rnams kyi dgos pa nub pa ste byams pa
T02D1419:137a-27: med pa nyid kyi phyir sdang ba'i byams pa rnams
T02D1419:137a-29: 'jig rten phyugs rnams shi ba bzhin du song //
T02D1419:137a-30: zhes bya ba ni sdang ba'i byams pa gang gis
T02D1419:137a-31: 'jig rten gyi phyugs la rnam par ma dpyad pas
T02D1419:137a-32: 'chi ba'o // slar yang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:137a-33: de'i phyir nga'i ngag la nyon la stong pa nyid spongs shig pa'o //
T02D1419:137a-34: des ci bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1419:137a-35: bdag gi padma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod //
T02D1419:137a-37: bdag gi shin tu kha bye ba rgya che ba
T02D1419:137a-38: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi padma byams pa'i
T02D1419:137a-39: ro'i gzugs de khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis shig /
T02D1419:137a-40: gang gis 'dod pa byas pas de ltar 'jig rten
T02D1419:137a-42: zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di rnams thams cad kyi bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:137b-1: dmyal ba la sogs par 'gro bar mi byed do //
T02D1419:137b-4: rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag la rol cig rol //
T02D1419:137b-6: kye bya ba bdag rdo rje 'chang bdag cag rab
T02D1419:137b-7: tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin ma rnams la rol pa
T02D1419:137b-8: dang rtsen pa gyis shig stong pa nyid kyi ting
T02D1419:137b-10: lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa 'thob //
T02D1419:137b-12: gang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin spang
T02D1419:137b-13: pa yod pas brjod du med pa'i lhan cig skyes
T02D1419:137b-14: pa'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba 'thob pa ste des
T02D1419:137b-15: sems can rnams kyi rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro
T02D1419:137b-16: // 'on kyang 'jig rten sems can gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas //
T02D1419:137b-18: gcig tu na khyod kyis rab tu dga' ba dang
T02D1419:137b-19: bral bas 'jig rten pa thams cad bkug cing mgron
T02D1419:137b-20: du bos pa yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1419:137b-21: byang chub kyi yul de'i tshe gzhan gnyis pa nyid du 'gyur te //
T02D1419:137b-22: des sems can gyi don mi 'grub po //
T02D1419:137b-23: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam las 'das par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:137b-25: ji ltar khyod kyi stong nyid don med do //
T02D1419:137b-26: zhes bya ba ste rgyu mtshan gang gis stong pa
T02D1419:137b-27: nyid dgos pa med pa la khyod kyis rab tu
T02D1419:137b-28: zhugs pas de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:137b-29: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dor la bdag gi mchog
T02D1419:137b-30: gi bde ba bla na med pa rab tu dga'
T02D1419:137b-31: ba'i bde pas 'dod pa gyis shig mnyam pa med
T02D1419:137b-32: pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu dga' ba'i ye
T02D1419:137b-33: shes 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1419:137b-34: // de bzhin du gzhan yang gsungs pa /
T02D1419:137b-35: khyod ni chos thams cad kyi byed pa ste //
T02D1419:137b-37: kye khyab bdag khyed ni chos thams cad kyi byed pa sems can gyi don bskyed pa rnams te /
T02D1419:137b-38: de'i tshe ci'i phyir stong pa nyid rang bzhin son
T02D1419:137b-39: par bzhugs zhes bya ba ste cis khyod lhan cig
T02D1419:137b-40: skyes pa'i rang bzhin gzungs pas des ma bzhud cig
T02D1419:137b-41: stong pa nyid du zhugs pa dor cig / de'i
T02D1419:137b-42: tshe yang bdag la mchog gi don gyis dgyes pa
T02D1419:137b-43: mdzod ces bya ba ste bdag 'jig rten gyi chos
T02D1419:138a-0: brgyad rnams la btang snyoms pa ste @138a * //
T02D1419:138a-1: 'on kyang snying rje'i rang bzhin can ma rnams la
T02D1419:138a-2: mchog gi don gyi bde bas 'dod pa gyis shig
T02D1419:138a-3: pa'o // ji ltar khyod ni 'jig rten dang mnyam 'gro //
T02D1419:138a-4: zhes bya ba ni gang gis don byed pa'i bde
T02D1419:138a-5: bas 'dod pa byas pha dang khyod kyis gzigs pas
T02D1419:138a-6: 'jig rten khyod dang mnyam par rab tu 'gro'o //
T02D1419:138a-7: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
T02D1419:138a-8: de'i tshe phan tshun sems can gyi don byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:138a-9: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa 'di'i
T02D1419:138a-10: glus bskul ba zhes bya ba ste sngon gyi smon
T02D1419:138a-11: lam gyis nye bar slong bas rab tu sad pa
T02D1419:138a-12: ste / he ru ka rang nyid ces bya ba
T02D1419:138a-13: ni sa bon gyi gzugs spangs nas mngon sum du
T02D1419:138a-14: he ru kar thig le bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams kyis
T02D1419:138a-15: snying rje la sogs pa'i gzugs can 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1419:138a-16: ba'i phyag dang gzugs la sogs pa dang lhan cig
T02D1419:138a-17: rab tu sad pa ni gsal ba'i gzugs te 'bras
T02D1419:138a-18: bu'i rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:138a-19: de ltar sngags kyi yi ge brjod pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1419:138a-20: can skad cig gis rnam pas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs
T02D1419:138a-22: aom a'a:zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:138a-23: yi ge bcu gnyis rnams su phyi rol la sogs
T02D1419:138a-24: pa'i padma'i bar du 'khor lo rnams dang padma dang
T02D1419:138a-25: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma thams cad dang
T02D1419:138a-26: lhan cig tu skyes pa ste lhag ma rnal 'byor
T02D1419:138a-27: pa rnams kyi sgom pa rnams ni thams cad rtogs
T02D1419:138a-28: par sla'o // 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de'i rnam par gzhag pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1419:138a-29: 'dir sngon du gang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams bdud rtsi'i dbus su bzhugs so //
T02D1419:138a-30: de'i rang bzhin las de'i tshe 'dir ye shes kyi
T02D1419:138a-31: rnam pa tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams snying
T02D1419:138a-32: rje dang byams pa dang dga' pa dang btang snyoms
T02D1419:138a-33: kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid rnams kyis 'dir zhugs
T02D1419:138a-35: de rnams kyis yang sngon gyi mtshan nyid rjes su
T02D1419:138a-36: dran par byas nas lus kyi bdud rtsi za ba
T02D1419:138a-37: la zhen pas gang byas pa sngon gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1419:138b-0: bsgoms pa la sogs pa'i @138b las de thams cad
T02D1419:138b-1: rjes su dran par byas nas sad do //
T02D1419:138b-2: mig gi dbang po la sogs pas thams cad mthong ngo //
T02D1419:138b-3: gang sngon gyi zla ba dang nyi ma bsrubs pas bdud rtsi bskyed do //
T02D1419:138b-4: de rnams kyis yang rang gi lus bdud rtsi nyid
T02D1419:138b-5: kyi phyir zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa
T02D1419:138b-6: dang rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo mthong do //
T02D1419:138b-7: de'i tshe bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi chos kyi
T02D1419:138b-8: 'khor lo sngags brjod pas ri rab la sogs pa
T02D1419:138b-9: dang nam mkha'i mtha' thams cad mthong ngo //
T02D1419:138b-10: de las ngag skyes te des yang 'jig rten dang
T02D1419:138b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi stan bcos
T02D1419:138b-12: byung ngo // de ltar bstan bcos rjes su dran
T02D1419:138b-13: pa byas nas gang dang gang gis bram ze dang
T02D1419:138b-14: rgyal rigs la sogs pa ji ltar yang dkyil 'khor
T02D1419:138b-15: gyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' mo rnams
T02D1419:138b-17: der rigs kyi las rnams la gnas nas so //
T02D1419:138b-18: 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan sred pa dang sdang ba byung ba'o //
T02D1419:138b-19: des s'a lu la sogs pa'i lo tog gang du btab pas sa rnams kyi cha byung do //
T02D1419:138b-20: lte ba gcig ni bud med do //
T02D1419:138b-23: gar ni gar gyi nyams dgu la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:138b-24: sna tshogs pa'i gar dang glu dang rol mo dang
T02D1419:138b-25: skad dang lung la sogs pa dang 'dod pa'i bstan
T02D1419:138b-26: bcos dang zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang gti mug
T02D1419:138b-27: dang phrag dog la sogs pa dang khro ba dang
T02D1419:138b-28: 'thab pa dang gtam brjod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1419:138b-29: nyid dang bla ma la bsnyen bkur ba dang mchod
T02D1419:138b-30: pa byed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1419:138b-31: sbyin pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1419:138b-33: dam pa'i chos kyi sems dang /
T02D1419:138b-34: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs kyi sems
T02D1419:138b-35: dang de la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes
T02D1419:138b-36: rnams byung ngo // lus ni nag po de bzhin
T02D1419:138b-37: du ljang gu phyed phyed can zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:138b-38: mtshan mo dang nyin par gyi 'du shes so //
T02D1419:138b-39: phyag bdun cu rtsa drug rnams kyi zhes bya ba
T02D1419:138b-40: ni g-yon pas khams sum cu rtsa brgyad rnams 'byin
T02D1419:139a-5: las kyi dbang po dang las kyi dbang po'i yul te /
T02D1419:139a-6: de ltar drug drug pas sum cu rtsa drug ste khu ba dang khrag gnyis so //
T02D1419:139a-7: 'di rnams g-yas par sdud pa ste zung gi tshig tu gnas so //
T02D1419:139a-8: de bzhin du zhal rnams ni bcu bdun zhes bya
T02D1419:139a-9: ba ni sngon du bshad pa rnams kyis 'di ni
T02D1419:139a-10: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas khams bcu
T02D1419:139a-11: drug rnams te bcu bdun pa ni rnam par shes
T02D1419:139a-12: pa'o // ral pa'i cod pa na 'dzin zhes bya
T02D1419:139a-13: ba ni sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten sgrin du re
T02D1419:139a-14: ba rnams 'khor lo can du bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D1419:139a-15: dam pa'i chos la gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1419:139a-16: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i dra
T02D1419:139a-17: rnams kyis sngon gyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i
T02D1419:139a-18: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa skyes pa rnams kyi
T02D1419:139a-19: g-yul ngo las rgyal ba nyid kyis so //
T02D1419:139a-20: sna chos rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D1419:139a-21: dang chos dang dge 'dun dang bla ma dang rnal
T02D1419:139a-22: 'byor ma rnams la dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1419:139a-23: // zla ba phyed pa can zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:139a-24: ro mchog myang ba dang khu ba'i thigs pa zhu
T02D1419:139a-26: mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1419:139a-27: zhes bya ba ni sdang ba rnams tshar gcod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1419:139a-28: zhal rnams ser ba dang ljang gu dang dmar po
T02D1419:139a-29: dang po dang nag po'i kha dog gis dus bzhi
T02D1419:139a-30: dang bzhi dang thun mtshams bzhi dang dus tshod bzhi'i
T02D1419:139a-31: phyir ro // de ltar yang mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams
T02D1419:139a-32: g-yas dang g-yon pa na zhes bya ba ni ji
T02D1419:139a-33: lta ba'i rim pas glang po che'i pags pas 'khor
T02D1419:139a-35: skye gnas kyi phyag rgyas ni mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1419:139a-36: lhag ma phyag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshon cha
T02D1419:139a-37: rnams kyi dang de bzhin du mgo bo ldas brgyan
T02D1419:139a-38: pa dang phyag rgya drug gis dang mgo bo brgya'i
T02D1419:139a-39: phreng bas dang dpung rgyun gyis dang /
T02D1419:139a-40: zhabs gdub kyis dang de'i sgras dang stag gi pags
T02D1419:139a-41: pas dang ba spu 'khyil pa yis te de ltar
T02D1419:139a-42: brgyad cu rnams kyis sems kyi spyod pa stong phrag
T02D1419:139a-44: de ltar spyan lnga bcu rtsa gcig rnams kyis aom
T02D1419:139b-0: @139b gyi yi ge la sogs pa nas ka'i yi
T02D1419:139b-1: ge'i mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge rnams
T02D1419:139b-3: de ltar de'i mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1419:139b-4: pa dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D1419:139b-5: rdo rje phag mo'i bsgoms pa la mkhas pas sna
T02D1419:139b-6: tshogs pa'i gnas su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
T02D1419:139b-7: phyug ma rnams ma rnams bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:139b-8: dar gyi phreng ba ni dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma
T02D1419:139b-9: rnams la ste des sna tshogs pa'i sa'i dum bu
T02D1419:139b-10: rnams su chos la sogs pa yang dag par srung
T02D1419:139b-11: pa'i don du stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba la
T02D1419:139b-12: sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyal po byung do //
T02D1419:139b-13: brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1419:139b-14: pa rnams kyis byas pa'i las kyi phyir zhes bya
T02D1419:139b-15: ba'i don to // de ltar rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1419:139b-16: de zhu bar gyur pa ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1419:139b-17: 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang du rdzogs pa ni sgrub pa'o //
T02D1419:139b-18: de nas rdo rje phag mo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D1419:139b-19: mthar gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba la
T02D1419:139b-20: sogs pas dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D1419:139b-21: nge 'dzin lus kyi rang bzhin can no //
T02D1419:139b-22: da ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa /
T02D1419:139b-23: padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:139b-24: 'dir dang po'i sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang rgyal po rdzogs pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1419:139b-25: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog tu gnas pa'i dus te /
T02D1419:139b-26: gang gi tshe sngon gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
T02D1419:139b-27: shes rab dang thabs dag gis dang he ru ka
T02D1419:139b-28: dang rdo rje phag mo dag gis rang gi rig
T02D1419:139b-29: pa'i tshogs pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs rnams dang /
T02D1419:139b-30: rnal 'byor ma rnams spro zhing sdud pa'o //
T02D1419:139b-31: de bzhin du ri rab la sogs pa dang sa
T02D1419:139b-32: gzhi rnams gnas pa yod pas lha la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:139b-33: 'jig rten rnams dang rang rang gi gnas rnams kyi
T02D1419:139b-34: nges pas padma'i 'dab ma la sogs pa 'khor lo
T02D1419:139b-35: thams cad kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma sangs
T02D1419:139b-36: rgyas kyi rigs kyi 'jig rten rol pa ste rgyun
T02D1419:140a-0: chad pa med pa'i rgyud kyis @140a * //
T02D1419:140a-1: spro ba ste re re'i mtha' med pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:140a-2: de ltar shar la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i rigs las byung ba snga ste /
T02D1419:140a-4: mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02D1419:140a-5: 'od byed ma dang mdog nag ma //
T02D1419:140a-6: yongs gyur ma dang byis bcas ma //
T02D1419:140a-7: rjes su mdog ma kha dog sngo ba ste shar
T02D1419:140a-8: la sogs pa nas byang gi mthar sa gzhi'i rjes
T02D1419:140a-9: su rigs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D1419:140a-10: de las byung ba'i dngos po rnams kyis za ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1419:140a-11: de ltar l'a ma la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1419:140a-12: g-yon skor du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar me
T02D1419:140a-13: long du gdong la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan g-yon pa'i
T02D1419:140a-14: lus po ni g-yas par so sor gsal te g-yas
T02D1419:140a-15: pa'i lus po g-yon par kyang do //
T02D1419:140a-16: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1419:140a-17: su he ru ka la sogs pa dang rnal 'byor
T02D1419:140a-18: ma'o // des kyang g-yas pa'i lag pa rnams su g-yon pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02D1419:140a-19: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa rnams su g-yas pa'i mchod pas zhes bya ba ni gdams pa'o //
T02D1419:140a-20: de rnams kyis kyang ri rab gling thams cad kyi
T02D1419:140a-21: g-yon par so sor gsal te nyi ma'i lag pa'i
T02D1419:140a-22: 'od zer gyis kyang ste g-yon du shar nas g-yas
T02D1419:140a-23: su 'gro'o // de'i grib ma'i lag pa g-yas su shar nas g-yon du 'gro'o //
T02D1419:140a-24: de ltar yang bdud rtsi lnga'i snod las sngon gyi
T02D1419:140a-25: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas
T02D1419:140a-26: dang nye ba'i gnas kyi gnas rnams su thig le
T02D1419:140a-27: 'brul lo // de rnams kyis kyang dpa' bo dang
T02D1419:140a-28: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bstar bar bya bar
T02D1419:140a-29: 'brul lo // 'gyur ro // des yang lha rnams kyi nye bar longs spyod par 'gyur ro /
T02D1419:140a-30: g-yas brkyang zhes bya ba ni slar yang byang chub
T02D1419:140a-31: kyi lam rnams su rab tu 'jug par 'dod do
T02D1419:140a-32: // thod pa'i phred ba sogs 'dzin ma //
T02D1419:140a-34: sna tshogs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa rnams la dga' ba'o //
T02D1419:140a-35: phyag dang mtshon cha dag ni lta ba drug la sogs par 'jug par yang do //
T02D1419:140a-36: de byis pa'i sngags pa bsgrib par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1419:140a-37: phag mo ji ltar gcig tu na sangs rgyas ba'i
T02D1419:140b-0: ye @140b shes 'chad pa 'ba' zhig ma yin zhes
T02D1419:140b-1: bya ste 'di ni thig le'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:140b-2: da ni 'khor lo'i ra ba'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:140b-3: de'i phyi rol du zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1419:140b-4: ste thog mar ye shes kyi sku'i rnam par gzhag
T02D1419:140b-6: 'khor lo de'i bdag nyid rnams su yang do //
T02D1419:140b-7: de yang thog mar rdo rje'i 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D1419:140b-8: ba ni mi phyed pa'i gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1419:140b-9: // 'khor lo'i rab gnas pa thams cad kyi yang
T02D1419:140b-10: dngos po thams cad dbyer med pa'i sems te phan
T02D1419:140b-11: tshun dag 'dod chags la sogs pa med do //
T02D1419:140b-12: de nying de ltar bla na med pa'i rigs te
T02D1419:140b-13: 'di rnams thams cad kyi bla na med pa nyid
T02D1419:140b-14: kyi phyir dang mthar thug pa zhes bya ba ste
T02D1419:140b-15: nges pa'o // de ltar sa gzhi sngo dang gnag
T02D1419:140b-16: pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni ra rib kyi
T02D1419:140b-17: grib mas kyang ste sems dang sems las byung pa
T02D1419:140b-18: la sogs pa rnams kyis gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1419:140b-19: des kyang de rnams kyi de'i mdog go //
T02D1419:140b-20: de ltar mkha' 'go ma la sogs pa nas 'bar
T02D1419:140b-21: chen mo zhes bya ba'i bar rnams kyis rnal 'byor
T02D1419:140b-22: ma su ma cu rtsa drug rnams dang de'i rigs
T02D1419:140b-23: can rnams de'i rang bzhin rnams kyis 'khor lo'i ra
T02D1419:140b-25: de ltar phyag bzhi zhes bya ba ni rlung dang
T02D1419:140b-26: med dang chu dang nam mkha'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1419:140b-27: bdud rtsi zos pas rags pa nyid de sa med
T02D1419:140b-28: do // de ltar thod pa bdud rtsi'i snod dang
T02D1419:140b-29: khat'm ga rang dang gzhan gyi cha'i rdzas yongs gzung
T02D1419:140b-30: pa med de ser sna med pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1419:140b-31: do // ro // d'a ma ru zhes bya ba
T02D1419:140b-32: ni sgra dang sgra'i lan gyis 'du shes tsam kyang
T02D1419:140b-34: gri gug de bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa
T02D1419:140b-35: la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad
T02D1419:140b-37: skra grol ba zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dor ba'o //
T02D1419:140b-38: phyogs gos 'chang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'dod pa'o ;
T02D1419:140b-39: / phyag rgya lnga zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
T02D1419:140b-40: gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su gnas
T02D1419:140b-41: pa'o // rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:140b-42: sna tshogs pa'i bla ma'i gdams dag sngon gyi bag
T02D1419:140b-43: chags rjes su dran pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1419:141a-0: yi dgas gdan zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems kyi chos kyi @141a * //
T02D1419:141a-2: drag chen mo zhes bya ba ni rang gi lta ba la mngon par dga' ba'o //
T02D1419:141a-3: de ltar 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis nges par de ltar rig par bya'o //
T02D1419:141a-4: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:141a-5: sna tshogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan
T02D1419:141a-6: ba'o // shes rab thabs dang ldan pa mo //
T02D1419:141a-7: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur bas kyang bshad par bya'o //
T02D1419:141a-8: de ltar 'di la sogs pas gzugs med khams zhes
T02D1419:141a-9: bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams rnams kyi rigs
T02D1419:141a-11: gnas de yang zhes bya ba ni ri rab [?]
T02D1419:141a-12: kyi kun nas phyogs dang mtshams dang logs su gnas
T02D1419:141a-14: rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes bya ba ni sbyin
T02D1419:141a-15: pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rnam par bshad pa
T02D1419:141a-16: de rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rab tu phrad
T02D1419:141a-17: pa las thun mong gi sa ste de nyid de
T02D1419:141a-18: ltar phung pho lhag ma med pa'i don sna tshogs
T02D1419:141a-19: ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang po nyid kyi phyir
T02D1419:141a-21: 'dis gnas 'di rnams thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1419:141a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D1419:141a-23: 'jug pa bshad de 'di ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:141a-24: des gnas dad nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa slar
T02D1419:141a-25: zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di rnams thams cad 'chang
T02D1419:141a-26: par 'gyur ba'i rim bas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas
T02D1419:141a-27: dang zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang 'dun sa dang
T02D1419:141a-28: nye ba'i 'dun sa dang 'du ba dang nye ba'i
T02D1419:141a-29: 'du ba dang dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod
T02D1419:141a-30: dang pi la ba dang nye ba'i pi la ba
T02D1419:141a-32: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:141a-33: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams
T02D1419:141a-34: cad kyi khams gcig pa ste mig la sogs pa
T02D1419:141a-35: thams cad do // sum cu rtsa drug khams rjes
T02D1419:141a-36: su rim pas zhes bya ba ni yang dag par
T02D1419:141a-37: bshad pa sum cu rtsa drug la sum cu rtsa
T02D1419:141a-38: drug rnams kyis bsgyur bas de la stong nyis brgya
T02D1419:141a-39: dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur te gtso bo yon
T02D1419:141a-40: tan kun rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis so
T02D1419:141a-41: thams cad do // // de ltar 'di rtsa'i yi
T02D1419:141a-42: ges lams rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1419:141a-44: lnga ba'i don du dang po ste rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi khams so //
T02D1419:141b-0: rang bzhin can las @141b dpa' bo rnams kyi khams zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:141b-1: nges 'khor lo'i rva pha rnams su de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:141b-2: de slar yang sum cu rtsa drug dbye ba zhes
T02D1419:141b-3: bya ba ni de ltar 'khor lo'i ra ba la
T02D1419:141b-4: sogs pa'i gnas rnams su gling bcu gnyis rnams su
T02D1419:141b-5: 'gyur ro // der gnas de rnams su yang gnas
T02D1419:141b-6: dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnam par dag
T02D1419:141b-7: pas sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs rnams su 'gyur
T02D1419:141b-8: 'gyur ro // ro // yul dang yul rim pas phye'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T02D1419:141b-9: de ltar rdo rje'i 'khor lo rnams su gri gug
T02D1419:141b-10: gis bskor bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ste ye
T02D1419:141b-11: shes kyi pha rol tu son pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1419:141b-12: nges pa ste 'khor lo'i ra ba rnams su'o //
T02D1419:141b-13: de ltar yang ma gsungs kyang bshad par bya ste /
T02D1419:141b-14: rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo rnams de nas dbus
T02D1419:141b-15: kyi bdag nyid du lte ba'i padma rnams su yi
T02D1419:141b-16: ge nyid shu rtsa bzhis phag mo'i sngags rnams su
T02D1419:141b-17: lhag ma'i yi ge rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1419:141b-18: bskyed ba ste / le'u gnyis par bshad pas so //
T02D1419:141b-19: de bzhin du 'di nyid du bshad de go cha'i
T02D1419:141b-20: sngags kyi yi ge rnams dang dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1419:141b-21: mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams dang rnal 'byor ma bcu
T02D1419:141b-23: de ltar sum cu rtsa drug pa khor yug 'dzin gyi ri'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02D1419:141b-24: de la gnas pa rnams kyi lha drang srod rnams kyi rigs zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:141b-25: da ni thugs kyi 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02D1419:141b-26: de nas de'i phyi rol du zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:141b-27: sogs pas zla ba'i gling gi rnam par gzhag pa'o
T02D1419:141b-28: // thugs zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i gling rnams
T02D1419:141b-29: su gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi snying bskyed pa
T02D1419:141b-30: rnams kyi snying gi yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:141b-31: zla ba'i thig le nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1419:141b-32: dmar dang ser ba zhes bya ba ni rang gis
T02D1419:141b-33: rig pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir kha dog ces
T02D1419:141b-35: de ltar de'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su gnas pa'o //
T02D1419:141b-37: de ltar 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:141b-38: rdo rje 'chang ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1419:141b-39: nas gnod mdzes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D1419:141b-40: rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs can ma rnams
T02D1419:142a-1: ces bya ba la sogs pa nas thog mar de'i de zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:142a-2: 'on kyang gling rnams su gad rnam par gzhag pa
T02D1419:142a-3: de thams cad lung gi nang du rtogs par bya'o
T02D1419:142a-4: // gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor
T02D1419:142a-5: los sgyur ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi ming gsungs pa
T02D1419:142a-6: // / 'di rnams thams cad kyis yang 'khor los sgyur ba he ru ka chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1419:142a-7: de ltar he ru ka chung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:142a-8: de rnams kyi rigs rnams 'khor los sgyur ba rnams
T02D1419:142a-9: kyi blo dang ldan pa khyod kyis mtshon par bya'o
T02D1419:142a-10: zhes bya ba ni khyod kyis mig la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:142a-11: yul dang yul can ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D1419:142a-12: pa he ru ka'i gzugs rnams la sems bskyed pa
T02D1419:142a-14: de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo mdor bsdus pas bshad do zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:142a-15: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni sngon ma la ltos pa'o //
T02D1419:142a-16: de ltar yang rgya mtsho dang ri rnams su zhes
T02D1419:142a-17: bya ba ste sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho rnams su rdo
T02D1419:142a-18: rje phag mo'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi 'khrul
T02D1419:142a-19: 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1419:142a-20: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1419:142a-21: da ni yon tan thams cad ces bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo gsum pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:142a-22: de nas de'i phyir rol du thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas te /
T02D1419:142a-23: dkar po'i gling yon tan thams cad ces bya ba
T02D1419:142a-24: ste sna tshogs pa'i dam pa'i chos nye bar tshogs
T02D1419:142a-25: pas sems kyang bde ba nyid thob pa'o //
T02D1419:142a-26: de rnams kyis dkar po'i gling na gnas pa rnams
T02D1419:142a-27: bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste yon tan thams cad
T02D1419:142a-29: de'i phyir yang dkar ba dang dmar ma'i kha dog
T02D1419:142a-30: ste 'dzin pa med pas gnyis su med pa'i yon
T02D1419:142a-31: tan gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:142a-32: de ltar rdo rje'i rtsibs zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngon bzhin no //
T02D1419:142a-33: de rnams kyi yang rnal 'byor ma'i rigs gsungs pa //
T02D1419:142a-34: bram ze mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1419:142a-35: ko lpags mkhan ma'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1419:142a-36: zhes bya ba'i bar rnams kyis sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1419:142b-0: gi rigs rnams su yon @142b tan thams cad kyi
T02D1419:142b-2: zhing dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi yon tan gyi gzugs
T02D1419:142b-3: dang rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dang
T02D1419:142b-4: gnyis pa dkar po'i gling zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1419:142b-5: rang nyid shes rab thabs bdag nyid //
T02D1419:142b-6: ces bya ba ni rang rang gi rigs las byung ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:142b-7: rang nyid bla ma mchod pa'i gnas //
T02D1419:142b-8: zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'khor lo rtag tu
T02D1419:142b-9: mchod par bya ba ste rang nyid bla ma'i gzugs
T02D1419:142b-10: gtso bo dang lhan cig pa dngos grub thams cad
T02D1419:142b-11: ster ba po yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:142b-12: can zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:142b-13: de ltar rang gi ming brjod pa zhes bya ba
T02D1419:142b-14: la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad pa rnams
T02D1419:142b-15: te gtso bo la sogs pa 'di rnams thams cad
T02D1419:142b-16: dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad
T02D1419:142b-17: kyi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i sngags
T02D1419:142b-18: dang bzlas pa'i sngags su bya'o //
T02D1419:142b-19: de'i phyi ral du zlum pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:142b-20: sogs pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i yongs su gcod
T02D1419:142b-21: pa gsungs pa / zlum bo'i rnam pas g-yon dang
T02D1419:142b-22: g-yas pa'i sna'i bu gar dkyil 'khor rnams la khyab
T02D1419:142b-23: par byed pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1419:142b-24: ri mo gnyis su zhes bya ba ni gnyis dag
T02D1419:142b-25: aa wa dh'u t'ir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes
T02D1419:142b-27: phyi rol du de nyed do //
T02D1419:142b-28: ye shes kyi rnam pa rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o //
T02D1419:142b-29: de ltar sgo zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang
T02D1419:142b-30: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bstan
T02D1419:142b-31: par bya ba'i phyir 'di nges pa'o //
T02D1419:142b-32: de bzhin du shar la sogs ba'i sgo rnams dang
T02D1419:142b-33: me la sogs pa'i grar rnams su khva gdong ma
T02D1419:142b-34: la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su gzhag
T02D1419:142b-35: par bya ba'i phyir sngon du bshad pa'i kun tu
T02D1419:142b-37: de yang rdo rje phag mo'i thig le'i gnas nas
T02D1419:142b-38: 'dod pas sngon bzhin du shar gyi sgor gnas te
T02D1419:142b-39: khva gdong ma thig le'i gnas su yang 'gro'o //
T02D1419:142b-40: der yang yon tan thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i nang du son par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:143a-0: de ltar rdo rje phag mo khva dgong ma'i rnag bzhin gyi @143a * //
T02D1419:143a-1: 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa'i sbyor bas za ba'o //
T02D1419:143a-2: de bzhin du khva gdong ma rdo rje phag mo'i
T02D1419:143a-3: rang bzhin yon tan thams cad kyi la khor lo
T02D1419:143a-4: la gnas pa'o // gang gi tshe ye shes tsam
T02D1419:143a-5: g-yo ba dang rnam pa dang bcas pa de yang
T02D1419:143a-6: rab tu thim par 'gro'o / de bzhin du 'ug
T02D1419:143a-7: gdong ma gshol mnga' 'dzin gyi 'khor lor bshad do
T02D1419:143a-8: la gnas pa'o // // de bzhin du sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho khyi gdong ma'i'o //
T02D1419:143a-9: zla ba'i gling rnams su phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1419:143a-11: 'khor lo'i ra bar pho nya ma'o //
T02D1419:143a-12: padma'i 'dab ma rnams su mche gcigs [*gtsigs?] ma'i //
T02D1419:143a-14: de bzhin du dur khrod brgyad na gnas pa rnams
T02D1419:143a-15: dang 'byung po'i tshogs dang sgo'i grva rnams dang 'khor
T02D1419:143a-16: lo ni gshin rje 'joms ma la thams cad zhugs
T02D1419:143a-17: pa'o // lhag ma ji ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1419:143a-18: rim pas kun du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D1419:143a-19: pa'o // ni nges pa'o // 'dis yang 'di rnams
T02D1419:143a-20: thams cad kyi 'chi ba dang skye ba bshad pa'o
T02D1419:143a-21: pa'o // ni nges pa'o // // de ltar shar
T02D1419:143a-22: dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sa gzhi rnams nag
T02D1419:143a-23: po la sogs pas ri rab la bskor ba ste
T02D1419:143a-24: nyi mas thun mtshams bzhi dang gling bzhi rnams su
T02D1419:143a-26: de ltar phyi dang nang thams cad bshad pa ni kun du spyod pa'i nges pas so //
T02D1419:143a-27: thams cad kyang 'dir bya ste phyi dang na zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T02D1419:143a-28: gzhan thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:143a-29: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo de'i gsum pa
T02D1419:143a-30: yon tan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste yon
T02D1419:143a-31: tan thams cad las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1419:143a-32: to // de ltar yang 'dir mar gyi rgya mtsho'i
T02D1419:143a-33: seng ldeng can gyi ri'i rdo rje phag mo shes
T02D1419:143a-34: rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi 'khor lo
T02D1419:143a-36: de lta bu sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi 'khor
T02D1419:143a-37: lo gnyis ba rnams dang thog ma dang bdun pa
T02D1419:143a-38: rnams te 'dir gnyis pa dang brgyad ba zhes bya
T02D1419:143a-39: ba'o // da ni chos kyi sku dum bu gsum ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:143a-40: de nas phyi rol mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1419:143b-0: pa ste ye shes kyi @143b 'khor lo'i dur khrod
T02D1419:143b-1: rnams kyi 'khor lo'i ra ba'i phyi rol du nam
T02D1419:143b-2: mkha'i 'khor lo kun sha'i gling ste 'dam skyes sngon
T02D1419:143b-3: po lta bu zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis
T02D1419:143b-4: sngo ba ste thugs kyi 'dam skyes las byung ba
T02D1419:143b-5: nyid kyi phyir 'dam skyes ngang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1419:143b-6: de ltar mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs can ma rnams so //
T02D1419:143b-8: mi'am ci mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas
T02D1419:143b-9: sgra ldan ma zhes bya ba'i bar du rigs dang
T02D1419:143b-10: rigs can ma rnams te ku sha'i gling du gnas
T02D1419:143b-11: pa rnams so // de ltar nye ba'i zhing dang sngon ma la ltos pas gling gsum pa la'o //
T02D1419:143b-12: mkha' spyod rigs las skyes zhes bya ba ni rdzus
T02D1419:143b-13: skyes rnams te sems kyi dgongs ba khyad par 'phags
T02D1419:143b-14: zhes bya ba'o // ku sha'i gling pa rnams 'ongs pa zhas bya ba'o //
T02D1419:143b-15: lhag ma thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:143b-16: de bzhin du 'dir zho'i rgya mtsho dang blta na
T02D1419:143b-17: sdug gi rir rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo gnyis
T02D1419:143b-18: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can zhes bya
T02D1419:143b-19: ba'o // de yang gsum pa dang dgu pa'o //
T02D1419:143b-20: da ni de'i phyi rol du chos kyi sku'i rlung gi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:143b-21: de'i phyi rol rlung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
T02D1419:143b-22: la sogs pa ste kha dog sna tshogs sngon po
T02D1419:143b-23: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor las byung
T02D1419:143b-24: ba'i ye shes dpral ba las so //
T02D1419:143b-25: rang gi 'pho ba las byung bas //
T02D1419:143b-26: zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:143b-27: rdo rje'i rtsibs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D1419:143b-28: ming gzhan gyis nam mkha'i snying po mchog ces bya
T02D1419:143b-29: ba ni gang gi tshe nam mkha'i nang du rlung
T02D1419:143b-30: rnams kyi gnas te rlung dang rnam par shes pa
T02D1419:143b-31: nyid kyis so // de'i tshe nam mkha'i snying po ni chos kyi bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1419:143b-32: de yang nam mkha'i bdag med pa'i rlung gis chos rnams dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1419:143b-33: de'i phyir mi'am ci'i gling dang de'i rigs dang rus can zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:143b-34: de ltar 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i rigs bshad pa //
T02D1419:143b-35: mkha' lding ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas
T02D1419:143b-36: ri dgas mo zhes bya ba'i bar du sum cu
T02D1419:143b-37: rtsa drug gi rigs dang rigs can ma ste de
T02D1419:143b-38: ltar rnal 'byor rnams mi'am ci'i gling na gnas pa
T02D1419:144a-1: kha dog 'khor lo'i sa gzhi zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:144a-2: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi khyad par du byed pa
T02D1419:144a-3: gong dang 'dra ba ste rlung gi 'khor lo'i sa
T02D1419:144a-4: gzhi sna tshogs sngon po'i mdog dang 'dra ba ste
T02D1419:144a-5: rlung gi 'khor lo ri rnal 'byor ma thams cad
T02D1419:144a-6: kyi'o // yang na rang rang gi zhes bya ba
T02D1419:144a-7: ni nam mkha' lding la sogs pa gong dang 'dra
T02D1419:144a-8: ba ste gang dngos su dkar po la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:144a-9: mdog de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1419:144a-10: 'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes zhes bya ba'i di
T02D1419:144a-11: ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs kyis gang gi
T02D1419:144a-12: tshe rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gzugs dang bzhugs tshul
T02D1419:144a-13: la sogs pa de'i tshe yang nam mkha'i sgo da'i
T02D1419:144a-14: nang du de'i dkyil 'khor rnams su srog rnams thim
T02D1419:144a-15: par 'gyur ro // de'i phyir byung ba'i rigs rnams sgong skyes zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:144a-16: de yang yon tan dbye bas gsum //
T02D1419:144a-17: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang nam mkha' dang
T02D1419:144a-18: rlung gi yon tan rnams de nam mkha' dang rlung
T02D1419:144a-19: dang sa'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can ni yon tan
T02D1419:144a-21: de ltar chos kyi sku'i dang de bzhin du longs
T02D1419:144a-22: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can sngon bzhin no
T02D1419:144a-23: // drod gsher skyes kyi gzungs can zhes bya ba
T02D1419:144a-24: ni chos kyi sku'i skabs las sprul pa'i gzugs longs
T02D1419:144a-25: spyod rdzogs pa drod gsher skyes kyi gzugs te de
T02D1419:144a-26: ltar phan tshun du mngal skyes sprul ba'i sku'o //
T02D1419:144a-27: longs spyod rnams kyi khyad par gyis //
T02D1419:144a-28: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs nyid kyi phyir de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:144a-29: de ltar slar yang rlung gi 'khor lo 'di'i ngos
T02D1419:144a-30: su 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang rta rna can gyi
T02D1419:144a-31: rir rdo rje phag mo'i shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1419:144a-32: 'khor lo nyid dang bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba
T02D1419:144a-33: 'di rnams kyis 'di rnams thams cad kyi rgya mtsho
T02D1419:144a-34: dang ri la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi gling
T02D1419:144a-35: rnams su gang gi che mngon par brjod pa rnams
T02D1419:144a-36: kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams de'i gzugs la sogs pas
T02D1419:144a-37: de thams cad la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:144a-38: nges pa'o // da ni sa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
T02D1419:144a-39: de nas phyi rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:144b-0: kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin @144b gyis zhes bya
T02D1419:144b-1: ba ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba
T02D1419:144b-2: ye shes sam de kho na nyid des yang 'jig
T02D1419:144b-3: rten gyi khams krung krung gi gling gi rang bzhin
T02D1419:144b-5: de ltar de la gnas pa sa la spyod ma
T02D1419:144b-6: sa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1419:144b-7: te / sum cu rtsa drug rigs las byung ba
T02D1419:144b-8: rnams krung krung gi gling na gnas pa'i rigs rnams
T02D1419:144b-9: te / so // de ltar de'i rnal 'byor ma rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:144b-10: seng ge mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas
T02D1419:144b-11: grong na gnas pa ma mchog ces bya ba'i bar
T02D1419:144b-12: du'o // de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:144b-13: 'on kyang sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas kun du spyod pas bya'o zhes bya ba shad pa //
T02D1419:144b-14: bram ze mo shar gyi sgo nas 'ongs nas thig le'i gnas su'o //
T02D1419:144b-15: de la gnas pas rdo rje phag mo shar gyi sgor 'gro'o //
T02D1419:144b-16: de ltar bram ze mo de sngon du bshad pa'i
T02D1419:144b-17: ye shes kyi 'khor lo la rang gi 'pho ba
T02D1419:144b-18: las byung ba'i dbyu gu gcig gis longs spyad do
T02D1419:144b-19: // dbang phyug chen po yang mar gyi rgya mtsho dang du la ba'i ril 'khor lo gnyis la'o //
T02D1419:144b-20: de bzhin du gzhon nu ma nam mkha'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:144b-21: khyab 'jug ma slar yang zho'i rgya mtsho dang khor yug 'dzin gyi ri'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:144b-22: de ltar phag mo rlung gi 'khor lor ro //
T02D1419:144b-23: de bzhin du dbang po ma byed ma zhes bya ba'i ri dang /
T02D1419:144b-25: slar yang gtum mo sa'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:144b-26: dpal chen mo sgo skyong ma ni grva na gnas
T02D1419:144b-27: pa mo dang dur khrod kyi lha la longs spyod
T02D1419:144b-29: de ltar slar yang kun du spyod pa sngon du
T02D1419:144b-30: gsungs pa'i rim pas bya'o zhes bya ba ste thim
T02D1419:144b-31: pa dang longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1419:144b-32: sngon du bdag tu byed pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1419:144b-33: de ltar chu'i rgya mtsho dang dul ba'i ri'i rdo
T02D1419:144b-34: rje phag mo shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:144b-36: lnga pa dang bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D1419:144b-37: de ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can chos kyi sku can ma rnams la'o //
T02D1419:145a-0: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa sku gcig la @145a * //
T02D1419:145a-2: de la yang thog mar me'i 'khor lo bshad de /
T02D1419:145a-3: de nas phyi rol slar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:145a-4: kha dog dmar po zhes bya ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba'o //
T02D1419:145a-5: 'bar chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'o //
T02D1419:145a-6: rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag dgod //
T02D1419:145a-7: ces bya ba ni drag po'i gling zhes bya ba'i rigs dang rigs can ma'o //
T02D1419:145a-8: de'i yang rigs las byung ba de rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:145a-9: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1419:145a-10: bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad /
T02D1419:145a-11: ces bya ba'i par du pho nya mo sum cu
T02D1419:145a-12: rtsa drug de rnams kyi rigs drug pa drag po'i
T02D1419:145a-13: gling na gnas ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1419:145a-14: de ltar nus pa'i 'khor lo ni sna tshogs pa'i rigs nyid kyang rigs gcig las byung ba'o //
T02D1419:145a-15: lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo la sogs pas dang
T02D1419:145a-16: mchod pa dang mchod pa'i las la sogs pa'i khyad
T02D1419:145a-17: par ni 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1419:145a-19: 'dis de ltar khyad par gyi kun du spyod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1419:145a-20: des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'gro ba dang 'ong
T02D1419:145a-21: ba'i rgyus lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi
T02D1419:145a-23: di de ltar sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o //
T02D1419:145a-24: de'i tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ston pa gang
T02D1419:145a-25: gi tshe sngon gyi sangs rgyas nyid la brten nas
T02D1419:145a-26: bems po nyid du zhugs pa'i khams rnams kyis brgyal
T02D1419:145a-28: ji ltar nam mkha' la sprin glo bur ba rnams
T02D1419:145a-29: kyis g-yogs pa na yang dri ma med pa nyid
T02D1419:145a-30: do // de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:145a-31: des ni 'di la mchod mi byed //
T02D1419:145a-32: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i lag pa yis //
T02D1419:145a-34: ha'i yi ge ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T02D1419:145a-35: de bzhin du shin tu khams la brten pas lhag
T02D1419:145a-36: pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtag
T02D1419:145a-37: pa nyid du 'gro ste gang gi tshe de'i tshe
T02D1419:145a-38: 'chi ba'i tha ma nyid du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1419:145a-39: shi ba las phyugs rnams te phung po la sogs
T02D1419:145b-0: pa thams cad kyis zos pa @145b las thams cad
T02D1419:145b-1: 'grub ste phyag rgya chen po dang tshig thams cad
T02D1419:145b-2: dang / thams cad der thim par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:145b-3: de'i phyir phyugs rnams kyi sha thams cad sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1419:145b-4: kun nas kun du son pa las //
T02D1419:145b-5: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis 'chad pa /
T02D1419:145b-6: brgya la sngon gyi bag chags kyis shi na kun
T02D1419:145b-7: gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rnams sems can thams cad
T02D1419:145b-8: la sogs pa'i las dang yon tan gyi dbang gis
T02D1419:145b-9: rjes su dran te gang gi tshe dri za'i sems
T02D1419:145b-10: can btung bar bya ba dang bldag par bya ba
T02D1419:145b-11: la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi dri zhim pos tshim par
T02D1419:145b-12: byed do // des kyang sngon gyi bag chags kyi rnams pa'i rnam pas kun nas gnas so //
T02D1419:145b-13: de ltar 'di rnams thams cad la gzung ba'i dngos
T02D1419:145b-14: pos dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rgyus
T02D1419:145b-15: btung bar bya ba sna tshogs pa rnam par sbyin
T02D1419:145b-16: par bya'o // bldag bya sna tshogs de bzhin du //
T02D1419:145b-17: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1419:145b-18: de ltar langs nas zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi lus rang gi gnas spong ste /
T02D1419:145b-19: de'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa mo can gyi mchod pa rnams rdo rje 'chang gis byed pa'o //
T02D1419:145b-20: lus kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi gang du byung ba
T02D1419:145b-21: de la zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o
T02D1419:145b-22: // slar yang smon lam gyis log nas 'khor lo
T02D1419:145b-23: bcu gnyis pa rnams su mchod pa rdo rje 'chang
T02D1419:145b-24: gi rang bzhin gyis dang rna tshogs pa'i mkhas pa
T02D1419:145b-25: rnams kyis mchod pa la sogs pa rnag rang gi
T02D1419:145b-26: slob ma rnams la chos 'jug par byed do //
T02D1419:145b-27: de rnams kyi yang 'di rnams thams cad kyi dpa'
T02D1419:145b-28: bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi mchod pa la sogs
T02D1419:145b-29: pa de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1419:145b-30: 'dis bsgrubs pas dang lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs
T02D1419:145b-31: dang mi mthun pa la sogs pas kyang sangs rgyas
T02D1419:145b-32: rnams kyi tha mal pa'i dngos po'i phyir chos 'chad
T02D1419:145b-33: pa'i tha mal bar sems can rnams kyi yon tan
T02D1419:145b-35: phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid kyis kyang sangs rgyas
T02D1419:145b-36: des longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs zhes
T02D1419:145b-37: bya ba'i // 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang ngo //
T02D1419:146a-1: rdzogs pa'i sku'i dum bu me'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
T02D1419:146a-2: de ltar 'dir chang gi rgya mtsho dang de bzhin
T02D1419:146a-3: du bsil ba la sogs pa'i di rnams su rdo
T02D1419:146a-4: rje phag mo'i shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:146a-5: can gyi 'khor lo gnyis rnams drug pa dang bcu
T02D1419:146a-6: gnyis pa rnams zhes bya ba'o /
T02D1419:146a-7: da ni 'jam bu'i gling rnams su chu'i 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02D1419:146a-8: de nas de'i phyi rol du bshad par bya zhes
T02D1419:146a-9: bya ba la sogs pa ste chu'i 'khor lo zhes
T02D1419:146a-10: bya ba ni chu'i dkyil 'khor las byung bas so
T02D1419:146a-11: // rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i
T02D1419:146a-12: gling las kyi sa chen po'i rang bzhin te de
T02D1419:146a-13: las gang byed pa de thams cad len pa ste
T02D1419:146a-15: de'i phyir dkar po'i mdog ces bya'o //
T02D1419:146a-16: rang bzhin gyis dkar ba'i las rnams mdor bsdus pa 'thob ba'o //
T02D1419:146a-17: 'on kyang gling thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma lus
T02D1419:146a-18: par rtogs pa gang gi tshe de'i tshe rmongs pa
T02D1419:146a-19: dgu pas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo
T02D1419:146a-20: rnams g-yo dang sgyu la sogs pa la dga' ba
T02D1419:146a-21: rnams so // des rnal 'byor ma'i rigs 'di rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1419:146a-22: sum cu rtsa drug rim pas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:146a-23: sdang ba'i las kyi rang bzhin thams cad rnam par
T02D1419:146a-24: nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang khyad par du 'phags
T02D1419:146a-26: de'i rigs rnams kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:146a-28: sbre'u mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1419:146a-29: ka l'a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T02D1419:146a-30: de ltar 'dzam bu'i gling dum bu bcu gnyis bdag nyid can no //
T02D1419:146a-31: de la re re'i dum bu'i mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1419:146a-32: sogs pas ji ltar bshad pa'i rim pa de rnams
T02D1419:146a-33: su yang 'khor lo 'di la gnas pa mo rnams
T02D1419:146a-34: kyi rang bzhin dang gnas la sogs pa lam de'i
T02D1419:146a-36: ba tsha zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang gling
T02D1419:146a-37: 'di rnams su ba tsha'i rgya mtsho las ba tsha'i
T02D1419:146a-38: grong gling thams cad rnams su sbrang rtsi las sogs
T02D1419:146a-39: pas longs spyod kyi sa la rgya mtsho'i 'gro ba
T02D1419:146a-40: rnams kyi dang skye bo thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1419:146a-41: drod gsher skyes zhes bya ba ni mdor byas pas
T02D1419:146a-42: 'di la ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di drod gsher
T02D1419:146b-0: las des mi rnams mngal @146b skyes rnams kyi lang bsam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:146b-1: de bzhin du me'i 'khor lor gnas pa mo rnams
T02D1419:146b-2: kyi drod gsher skyes kyi bsam dang mngal skyes kyi
T02D1419:146b-3: yang ngo // de ltar mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1419:146b-4: zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig gi gling thams
T02D1419:146b-5: cad phal pa dang gtso bo re re'i gling la
T02D1419:146b-6: gling thams cad kyi bsam pa'i yon tan rnams yongs
T02D1419:146b-7: su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1419:146b-8: // de ltar chu'i 'khor lo 'dzam bu'i gling gi don can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ma'o //
T02D1419:146b-9: da ni ba tsha la sogs pas bskor ba'i gzhi
T02D1419:146b-10: rnams rim pa ji lta ba rnams su ye shes
T02D1419:146b-11: kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams
T02D1419:146b-12: su gsungs pa / de nas de'i phyi ro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:146b-13: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang
T02D1419:146b-14: du son pa rnams des kyang 'dzam bu'i gling dang
T02D1419:146b-15: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya
T02D1419:146b-16: ba gsungs so // ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes
T02D1419:146b-17: bya ba ni ye shes kyi kyil 'khor las byung
T02D1419:146b-18: bas de'i phyir kun nas yongs su bskor ba bzhin
T02D1419:146b-19: ba gsungs so // no // kha dog sna tshogs
T02D1419:146b-20: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1419:146b-21: ba gsungs so // no // so // lha ma
T02D1419:146b-22: yin mo rnams zhes bya ba ni des bskor ba
T02D1419:146b-23: la gnas pa mo rnams kyi rigs te des ni
T02D1419:146b-24: lha ma yin gyi rig so //
T02D1419:146b-25: rim pas zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dim pas
T02D1419:146b-26: g-yon ba dang g-yas ba'i sna'i kyil 'khor gyi yon
T02D1419:146b-27: tan nye bar bas gas pas so //
T02D1419:146b-29: thig le mchog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1419:146b-30: nas rigs kyi gzugs can ma zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1419:146b-31: du rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams lha
T02D1419:146b-32: ma yin mo rnams kyi rigs las byung ba chus
T02D1419:146b-33: bskor ba la gnas ma rnams so //
T02D1419:146b-35: 'on kyang sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas dur khrod dang 'khor lo gsum rnams su dang /
T02D1419:146b-36: de bzhin du rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo bzhi
T02D1419:146b-37: rnams kyi rang sgo na gnas pa mo dkar mo
T02D1419:146b-38: la sogs pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa gsungs
T02D1419:146b-39: pa / rdo rje phag mo thig le'i gnas nas 'ongs nas shar gyi sgor re //
T02D1419:146b-40: de la gnas pa'i dkar mo thig le'i gnas su 'gro'o //
T02D1419:146b-41: sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku
T02D1419:146b-42: dang chos kyi sku dag gis 'khor lo rnams za
T02D1419:146b-43: ba'o // de ltar tsoo r'i chu'i rgya mtshor dang /
T02D1419:146b-44: dri chen por rdo rje phag mo dang shes rab dang thabs kyi 'khor lo gnyis so //
T02D1419:147a-1: du bet'a l'i drag po'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-2: gha sma r'i chang gi ryga mtshor rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-3: slar yang pukka s'i bsil ba la sogs pa'i rir dang rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-4: de ltar sha ba ra'i 'dzam khum bu'i gling gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-5: de bzhin du tsandal'i ba tshva dang /
T02D1419:147a-7: do mbi na'i sgor gnas pa mo rnams dang de bzhin du dur khrod kyi lha rnams zhes bya'o //
T02D1419:147a-8: lhag ma sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i //
T02D1419:147a-9: 'di ni mdor bsdus pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-10: de ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1419:147a-11: de ltar yang rdo rje'i ri rnams su dkyil 'khor
T02D1419:147a-12: gyi 'khor lo'i ra ba dang sna tshogs ba'i dpa'
T02D1419:147a-14: da ni sprul pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1419:147a-15: gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi thugs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1419:147a-17: de nas de yi phyi rol bshad //
T02D1419:147a-18: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:147a-19: thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di zhes bya ba ni dkyil
T02D1419:147a-20: 'khor thams cad kyi g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag
T02D1419:147a-21: gi sems kyi rtsol ba dag gis byung ba ste
T02D1419:147a-23: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'chang par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rigs las so //
T02D1419:147a-24: kha dog gnag ces bya ba ni me yis bskor
T02D1419:147a-25: ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs khi 'khor lo
T02D1419:147a-26: yang bo ; / de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin mchog skyes pa //
T02D1419:147a-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad sems kyi rtsol ba las te
T02D1419:147a-29: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba
T02D1419:147a-30: ni nges pa'o // 'di'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:147a-31: klu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas grul
T02D1419:147a-32: bum mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D1419:147a-33: rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams so //
T02D1419:147a-34: lha mo chen mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:147a-35: sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid //
T02D1419:147a-36: ces bya ba ni de ltar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1419:147a-37: ma'i 'khor lo de yang sems kyi rang bzhin dag
T02D1419:147a-38: par byed pa gang gi tshe rang bzhin thams cad
T02D1419:147a-39: kyi bar dang bar rnams su sna tshogs ba'i sdang
T02D1419:147a-41: de'i tshe thams cad du son pa'i 'khor lor 'dod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:147a-42: de ltar rang bzhin spangs pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:147a-43: de'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gsungs pa ste
T02D1419:147a-44: de yang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bdag med pa
T02D1419:147b-0: can zhes bya ba ni gnas @147b dang bral ba
T02D1419:147b-1: des de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i
T02D1419:147b-2: mes bskor ba'i bdag nyid kyi sa'i phyi rol zhes
T02D1419:147b-3: bya ba ste ro'i lus lta bu bdag nyid kyi
T02D1419:147b-4: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i mes bsreg pa'o //
T02D1419:147b-5: rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin gyis sdang ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:147b-6: 'dis ji skad bshad ba gsungs pa /
T02D1419:147b-7: thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid rang bzhin tsam gyi ye shes so //
T02D1419:147b-8: de yang mi bden pa ste dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1419:147b-10: 'di rnams thams cad 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'dis sgo skyong ma gsungs so //
T02D1419:147b-11: gnas bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni dum bu dang
T02D1419:147b-12: bo ye shes kyi sku'i 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su
T02D1419:147b-13: sgo skyong ma rnams de bzhin du bcu gnyis zhes
T02D1419:147b-14: bya ba ni sku gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gnas rnams
T02D1419:147b-15: su dang sgo bcu gnyis rnams su sgo skyong ma
T02D1419:147b-17: de'i phyir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsdus pa'o //
T02D1419:147b-18: de ji ltar zhe na gnas bzhi rnams slar yang
T02D1419:147b-19: bcu gnyis zhes bya bas chas phye ba gsungs pa
T02D1419:147b-20: / ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi
T02D1419:147b-21: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang stong pa nyid dang
T02D1419:147b-23: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i dngos po nyid kyis
T02D1419:147b-24: zhes bya ba ni brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang
T02D1419:147b-25: dang yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin sprul pa dang
T02D1419:147b-26: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi rim ba ji
T02D1419:147b-27: lta ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1419:147b-28: bzhi zhes bya ba ni gnas gsum rnams su stong pa nyid bcu gnyis rnams so //
T02D1419:147b-29: de ltar thog ma'i bzhi sprul ba'i gnyis pa bzhi
T02D1419:147b-30: longs sbyong rdzogs pa gsum pa'i bzhi chos kyi sku'i
T02D1419:147b-31: lhag ma bzhi ye shes kyi zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:147b-32: rim pa ji lta ba yis zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:147b-33: nges pa'o // dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid //
T02D1419:147b-34: ces bya ba ni thim pa dang longs spyod pa
T02D1419:147b-35: dang bdag tu byed pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag
T02D1419:147b-36: nyid can rnal 'byor ma de la thim nas song
T02D1419:147b-38: dbugs kyi 'pho ba'i dbye ba dang kun du spyod
T02D1419:147b-39: pas dbugs 'bab pa'i phyir sems rtsa de'i nang du
T02D1419:147b-40: bcom pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste
T02D1419:147b-41: rang gis chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs can de de
T02D1419:147b-44: 'di ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i sbrul pa'i 'khor lo dang po'o //
T02D1419:148a-0: @148a * // da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:148a-1: de nas phyi rol du gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
T02D1419:148a-2: gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams
T02D1419:148a-3: thams cad kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi rang rang gi
T02D1419:148a-4: ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dus rnams su 'dis
T02D1419:148a-6: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i lha la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:148a-7: lus po'am rlung dang rnam par shes ba dag tu
T02D1419:148a-8: de dag gi 'khor lor bshad de /
T02D1419:148a-9: rlung gis bskor ba'i dbus su'o //
T02D1419:148a-10: dmar dang btsod gyi [*kyi] kha dog ces bya ba
T02D1419:148a-11: ni 'dod chags chen pos rjes su chags pa'i bdag
T02D1419:148a-12: nyid rnam par shes pa dang rlung gi dbus su'o
T02D1419:148a-13: // de ltar de la gnas pa mo rnams so //
T02D1419:148a-14: gtso zhes bya ba ba ni rigs sum cu rtsa
T02D1419:148a-15: drug rnams rang bzhin gyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1419:148a-17: mchod bzhes bya ba la sogs pa nas las kun
T02D1419:148a-18: byed ma zhes bya ba'i bar rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1419:148a-20: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'dod chags chen
T02D1419:148a-21: pos rjes su chags pas che ba zhes bya ba
T02D1419:148a-22: ste rang gi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i sangs rgyas
T02D1419:148a-23: kyi gzugs can ma sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du
T02D1419:148a-24: son pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:148a-25: 'dis kyang ci gsungs par 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
T02D1419:148a-26: rang rang gi rnag bzhin spangs pas dngos su stong
T02D1419:148a-27: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dngos po thams cad ces
T02D1419:148a-28: bya ba'o // de'i phyir sa kun du 'od zer
T02D1419:148a-29: bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba'o
T02D1419:148a-30: bya ba'o // // gdan bzhi rnams kyi zhes bya
T02D1419:148a-31: ba la sogs pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1419:148a-32: sogs pa de'i rgyud du rab tu grags pa zhes
T02D1419:148a-33: bya ba ste lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
T02D1419:148a-34: da ni 'di'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di'i gsum pa sku'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:148a-35: de nas sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
T02D1419:148a-36: sku'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams
T02D1419:148a-37: cad kyi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can khams gsum pa
T02D1419:148a-39: gang gi tshe de'i tshe 'khor lo thams cad kyi
T02D1419:148a-40: sku'i mthar gyur pa ste sku'i nang du 'khor lo
T02D1419:148a-41: thams cad do // de'i phyir sku'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la gnas te /
T02D1419:148a-42: ji ltar nam mkha'i nang nas sna tshogs pa yang dag par 'byung se /
T02D1419:148a-43: sna tshogs pa nang ni nam mkha'o //
T02D1419:148b-0: @148b de bzhin du lus kyi nam mkha' nang las thams cad yang dag par byung ste /
T02D1419:148b-1: thams cad kyi nang du lus kyi nam mkha' zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1419:148b-2: des 'di'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mdog can ces bya ba ste /
T02D1419:148b-3: dkar ba dang dmar ba dang gnag pa'i mdog gis
T02D1419:148b-4: dang sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1419:148b-6: dir rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma zhes bya
T02D1419:148b-7: ba ni rgyur ma zhes bya ba ni rgyal chen
T02D1419:148b-8: bzhi'i rigs kyi ma la sogs pa'i bus su gang
T02D1419:148b-9: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma sum cu rtsa
T02D1419:148b-10: drug go // de ltar 'dir kyil 'khor pa'i lha mo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1419:148b-11: de'i rigs las byung ba nam mkha'i bskor ba la gnas ba mo rnams zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:148b-12: de ltar 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:148b-13: rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi ma zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:148b-14: sogs pa nas dbang po ma zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1419:148b-15: du 'khor los sgyur ma'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu
T02D1419:148b-16: rtsa drug rnams su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D1419:148b-17: la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:148b-18: sa ni mos pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:148b-19: thog mar nam mkha' 'du shes can smon lam gyis
T02D1419:148b-20: de bzhin du de nyid kyi mthar thug pa can
T02D1419:148b-21: ma bcu gnyis dang mos pa spyod pa nam mkha'i
T02D1419:148b-22: 'khor lo rnams su kun nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1419:148b-23: na gnas na'o // des ci der 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
T02D1419:148b-24: bcu gnyis po de 'khor lo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1419:148b-25: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni de ltar
T02D1419:148b-26: sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul
T02D1419:148b-27: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1419:148b-28: de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can rnams te
T02D1419:148b-29: des tu'i sbras ni nges par gzungs ba'o //
T02D1419:148b-31: zhes bya ba ni 'dir gang gi byir sprul pa'i
T02D1419:148b-32: skur 'du shes pa can gru bzhi la sgos pa'i
T02D1419:148b-33: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa byang
T02D1419:148b-34: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnam par dag pa zhes
T02D1419:148b-35: bya ba la sogs pas stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs
T02D1419:148b-36: pa bzhi la sos pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gzugs
T02D1419:148b-37: ri mo snga la sogs pa de de bzhin du
T02D1419:148b-38: bshad do // brgyad gnyis lha mo zhes bya ba
T02D1419:148b-39: ni bcu drug rnams kyis te mchod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1419:148b-40: ma rnams kyi mchod pa byas ni /
T02D1419:149a-1: bzhi rnams la rnal 'byor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis byas pas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1419:149a-2: de ltar slar yang sgo skyong ma rnams kyi rim
T02D1419:149a-3: ba ji lta ba rnams su kun du spyod pa
T02D1419:149a-4: gsungs pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i thig le'i gnas nas
T02D1419:149a-6: de la gnas pa'i chu skyes dkar mo thig le'i gnas su 'ong ngo //
T02D1419:149a-7: der ye shes dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams la za ba'o //
T02D1419:149a-8: de ltar gandha ri ma rdo rje'i ri'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:149a-9: de bzhin du rdo rje gar ma thugs kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:149a-10: slar yang rta rgod ma'i gdong can gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:149a-11: de ltar rdo rje 'bar ba'i zhal can ma sku'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1419:149a-12: de bzhin du rdo rje khro gnyer gyi zhal can
T02D1419:149a-13: ma'i mchod pa'i lha mo drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams
T02D1419:149a-14: la'o // slar yang rdo rje dum bu ma rnams
T02D1419:149a-15: kyi sgo skyong ma drug rnams dang de bzhin du
T02D1419:149a-16: dur khrod brgyad na gnas pa mo rnams so //
T02D1419:149a-17: de ltar de bzhin du yang rdo rje gtum mo
T02D1419:149a-18: rnams kyi yi shes dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1419:149a-19: pa dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo can ma la ste
T02D1419:149a-20: / 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la za ba'o //
T02D1419:149a-21: lhag ma ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i rim pas
T02D1419:149a-22: thim pa dang longs spyod pa dang bdag tu byed
T02D1419:149a-23: pa rim pas kun du spyod pa bya ste /
T02D1419:149a-24: dbyug gu dang chu tshod so sor zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:149a-25: drag chen mos ni snying rje chen pos brlan pas
T02D1419:149a-26: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa la
T02D1419:149a-27: sogs pa'i sdig pa chen po 'joms pa'o //
T02D1419:149a-28: gtsigs pa'i zhal ni ngo bo nyid kyi zhal sdig
T02D1419:149a-29: pa'i dbang gis sdig pa chen po las byung ba'i
T02D1419:149a-30: sems can rnams za ba mo'o //
T02D1419:149a-32: zhes bya ba ni khro bo thams cad la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams ring du byed pa'o //
T02D1419:149a-33: thams cad mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin //
T02D1419:149a-35: dpa' po dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis zhe sdang
T02D1419:149a-36: la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnams kyis tshig nges par
T02D1419:149a-37: gcod pa'o // dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can //
T02D1419:149a-39: re re sangs rgyas 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:149a-40: ral pa'i cod pan zhes bya ba ni rang gi
T02D1419:149b-0: rigs rnams las 'byung bas sna tshogs pa'i @149b rnam
T02D1419:149b-1: pa'i 'khor lo de rnams 'khor lor bya ba'i phyir
T02D1419:149b-2: dang glen pa'i 'jig rten la yang chos ston pas
T02D1419:149b-4: lus kun thal pa'i rdul kyis [*gyis] gyugs [?] //
T02D1419:149b-5: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa rnams las
T02D1419:149b-6: byung bas sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa'i gang gi ming
T02D1419:149b-7: de rnams kyi chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir ming
T02D1419:149b-8: la sogs pa'i tshig de thar pa thams cad nye
T02D1419:149b-9: bar spyod pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:149b-10: rnal 'byor ma rnams nu ma mkhrang //
T02D1419:149b-11: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
T02D1419:149b-12: sogs pas mkhrang ba'i nu ma de mnyes pa las
T02D1419:149b-13: so // lag gdub ces bya ba na srog gcod
T02D1419:149b-14: pa la sogs pa thams cad sdig pa la sogs
T02D1419:149b-15: pa'i lag pa bskyod pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1419:149b-16: spyi gtsug rgyan zhes bya ba ni sems cad thams
T02D1419:149b-17: cad lang rgyal la sogs pa dang bral bas phag
T02D1419:149b-18: 'tshal bas mgo la gtsug tor gyis brgyan ba'o //
T02D1419:149b-19: de la sogs pa du ma dam pa'i chos gsungs
T02D1419:149b-20: pa'i yon tan gyi rnam grangs kyis mtshan nyid phun
T02D1419:149b-21: sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa'o //
T02D1419:149b-22: de ltar rnal 'byor ma thams cad rdo rje phag
T02D1419:149b-23: mo'i rigs byung ma zhes bya ba ni aa wa
T02D1419:149b-24: dh'u t'i la brten pa'i sems so //
T02D1419:149b-25: dor bsrub ba dang srubs pas srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams kyi'o //
T02D1419:149b-26: des kyang 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi ting nge
T02D1419:149b-27: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i stos pa'i stong pa
T02D1419:149b-28: nyid thob pa yod pas snying rje las byung ba'i
T02D1419:149b-29: rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig de rigs can te
T02D1419:149b-30: de'i tshig spros pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi
T02D1419:149b-31: rigs rnams so // de'i phyir phag mo'i rigs byung ma //
T02D1419:149b-32: zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:149b-33: dpa' bo rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpa' bo las spros pa'i mi rnams su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1419:149b-34: de ltar rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la
T02D1419:149b-35: sogs pa nas thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1419:149b-36: du 'khor lo dang por 'khor lo'i ra ba rnams
T02D1419:149b-37: su dpa' bo sum cu rtsa drug ste /
T02D1419:149b-38: lhag ma zhes bya ba la sogs ba nas gtso po zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:149b-39: 'on kyang dman pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1419:149b-40: ste bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag ces bya ba
T02D1419:149b-41: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams
T02D1419:149b-42: su bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1419:150a-0: de bzhin du sogs pa'i sgras rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis @150a * //
T02D1419:150a-1: rnams su bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1419:150a-2: slar yang de ltar 'di'i snying po'i padma rnams su
T02D1419:150a-3: dang gzhan gyis rnams 'byor ma rnams kyi dpa' po
T02D1419:150a-5: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i padma rnams su nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1419:150a-6: de ltar sgo rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1419:150a-7: de bzhin du phyi rol du 'khor lo'i ra ba rnams su sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02D1419:150a-8: lhag ma sku bzhi'i phyi rol du dur khrod rnams su bzhi'o //
T02D1419:150a-9: de ltar bzhis dman pa'i stong gi ming can ni
T02D1419:150a-10: yon tan gyi dbye pas so so ba rnams zhes
T02D1419:150a-11: bya'o // gang gi phyir sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid
T02D1419:150a-12: can dang sangs rgyas thams cad dpa' po nyid kyis
T02D1419:150a-13: dpa' bo'i yon tan la zhugs pa zhes bya ba
T02D1419:150a-14: bya'o // ni nges pa'o // de ltar sangs rgyas
T02D1419:150a-15: rnams kyi mtshan rnams ni de kho na nyid 'dus
T02D1419:150a-16: par gsungs pa rnams te dpa' bo dang dpa' bo'i
T02D1419:150a-17: dbang phyug 'di rnams kyis yang kun du spyod pa
T02D1419:150a-18: bya'o // ni nges pa'o // gsungs pa / gang
T02D1419:150a-19: dang gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1419:150a-20: de ltar bcu gnyis po rnams sam sum cu rtsa
T02D1419:150a-21: drug gi 'khor lo rnams kyi rim pa ji lta
T02D1419:150a-22: pas thog ma la sogs par yang yongs su bzhag
T02D1419:150a-23: nas rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams
T02D1419:150a-24: bya'o // ni nges pa'o // gsungs pa / kyang
T02D1419:150a-25: ngo // rnal 'byor ma yang gcig la gcig dpa'
T02D1419:150a-26: bo rnams la gnas dang nye pa'i gnas la sogs
T02D1419:150a-27: par kun du spyod pa'i phyir dang lhag ma za
T02D1419:150a-28: bya'o // ni nges pa'o // gsungs pa / kyang
T02D1419:150a-29: ngo // ba yis so // yang na 'khor lo
T02D1419:150a-30: bcu gnyis rnams su thog ma la sogs pa'i rnal
T02D1419:150a-31: 'byor ma rnams kyis sum cu rtsa drug 'dab ma'i
T02D1419:150a-32: padma rnams dum bu gcig gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1419:150a-33: bya'o // ni nges pa'o // gsungs pa / kyang
T02D1419:150a-34: ngo // ba yis so // rnams su bya'o //
T02D1419:150a-35: dbus kyi padmar yang sngon bzhin no //
T02D1419:150a-36: de ltar re re'i padma bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:150a-37: can gyi dbus su de rnams gtso bo sngon du
T02D1419:150a-38: gsungs pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa nas
T02D1419:150a-39: thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i bar te /
T02D1419:150a-40: de rnams kyi yang rnal 'byor ma rnams rdo rje
T02D1419:150a-41: phag mo la sogs pa padma'i 'dab mar bshad pa
T02D1419:150a-42: dang bcas pa rnams bcu gnyis la brten pa rnams
T02D1419:150a-43: so // de ltar yang sa bcu gnyis po rnams
T02D1419:150a-44: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye bas sum 'gyur
T02D1419:150a-45: du 'gyur ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02D1419:150a-46: de ltar bcu gnyis bcu gnyis pa'i padma rnams kyi
T02D1419:150b-0: dang 'khor lo @150b gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyis so
T02D1419:150b-1: // re re la yangs bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams kyis so //
T02D1419:150b-2: de bzhin du lhag ma 'dir bcu gsum pa rdo
T02D1419:150b-3: rje 'chang chen po'i sa sbo dang grva la gnas
T02D1419:150b-4: pa mo zhes bya ba ste sgo'i bdag nyid can
T02D1419:150b-5: no // dkyil 'khor la sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras
T02D1419:150b-6: rdo rje phag mo'i 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis kyi sngags
T02D1419:150b-7: kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma la padma 'dab ma
T02D1419:150b-8: bcu gnyis pa rnams bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1419:150b-9: no // rnams bya'o // sum cu rtsa drug dang
T02D1419:150b-10: bcu gnyis lan gsum du bsgyur bas 'khor lo gsum
T02D1419:150b-11: dang sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi phyi rol rnams
T02D1419:150b-12: no // rnams bya'o // su'o// de ltar 'khor lo
T02D1419:150b-13: drug po rnams slar yang sbo rnams kyi dbyibs zlum
T02D1419:150b-14: po'i dkyil 'khor rnams su kun nas ri mo'i phyi
T02D1419:150b-15: rol du dur khrod sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams rim
T02D1419:150b-17: sngon du bshad pa rnams so //
T02D1419:150b-18: de ltar 'khor lo 'di rnams re re gtso mo
T02D1419:150b-19: rnams kun du spyod pa las rnal 'byor ma bcu
T02D1419:150b-20: gnyis rnams kyi kun du spyod pa dbus rnams su
T02D1419:150b-21: sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:150b-22: de ltar shar dang byang dang nub dang lho gnas pa mo rnams kyi'o //
T02D1419:150b-23: de bzhin du shar dang dbang ldan dang byang dang
T02D1419:150b-24: nub dang lho'i logs kyi grva'i phyed pa rnams su
T02D1419:150b-25: gnas pa mo rnams kyi dang /
T02D1419:150b-26: de ltar lhag ma phyed ma la gnas pa rnams kyi me dang bden bral dang /
T02D1419:150b-27: rlung dang dpang ldan rnams kyi thams cad kun du spyod par shes par bya'o //
T02D1419:150b-28: 'dis stong gsum gyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
T02D1419:150b-29: 'jig rten gyi khams bskyed par gsungs par 'gyur ro
T02D1419:150b-30: / rdo rje'i ming zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:150b-31: 'on kyang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la phyi dang
