T02D1419:308b-11: yi ge la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rab tu 'joms
T02D1419:308b-12: pas yon tan 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1419:308b-13: pa dag sgrub pa dang sna tshogs par gnas pa'i
T02D1419:308b-14: khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la bzhag
T02D1419:308b-15: pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang
T02D1419:308b-16: bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po nyid pas rnam
T02D1419:308b-17: pa med par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chog rgyas
T02D1419:308b-18: par bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu
T02D1419:308b-20: / rang rig rang bzhin khyab bdag gi / dpal he ru kar phyag byas nas //
T02D1419:308b-22: / thams cad kyi ni rigs chen po //
T02D1419:308b-23: da ni dpa' bo chen po dpal he ru ka
T02D1419:308b-24: sems can thams cad la nye bar spyod pa'i bshad
T02D1419:308b-25: pa gsungs pa // de nas lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:308b-26: phag mos bcom ldan 'das de la ji lta bas
T02D1419:308b-27: cho gas nye bar spyod pa'i mchod pa byas nas
T02D1419:308b-29: gsungs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste ji
T02D1419:308b-30: ltar sngon du bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'i mtshan
T02D1419:308b-31: nyid de bzhin du gsungs shig pa'o //
T02D1419:308b-32: 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1419:308b-33: bshad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1419:308b-34: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes las byung ba zhes
T02D1419:308b-35: bya ba ni gang gi phyir rang gi rig pa
T02D1419:308b-36: las byung ba de rnams kyi rig pas bshad par
T02D1419:308b-39: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:309a-0: de'i rab tu sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i @309a * //
T02D1419:309a-1: ming gis yi ge'i rigs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1419:309a-2: 'dir thog ma nyid du sbyor ba rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:309a-3: rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa rang gi zhes bya
T02D1419:309a-4: ba ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkar po'i tshes gcig
T02D1419:309a-6: de bzhin du rang gi yi shes kyi rgya mtsho
T02D1419:309a-7: zla ba'i cha ltar 'phel te sbyor ba bsgom pas
T02D1419:309a-8: so // sbyor ba sgom pa ni 'dir 'chad par
T02D1419:309a-9: 'gyur ba yid kyang ste zla ba'i 'khor lo rnams
T02D1419:309a-10: su dpal he ru ka'i yi ge bsgom pas dga'
T02D1419:309a-11: ba bcu drug rnams su skyes te de rnams kyi
T02D1419:309a-12: rnam par gzhag pa zla ba'i cha rnams kyis ji
T02D1419:309a-13: lta ba bzhin du 'dir gsungs pa /
T02D1419:309a-14: thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:309a-15: 'pho ba rnams ni dbye bas rang bcu drug go //
T02D1419:309a-16: dga' ba thog ma skye ba'o //
T02D1419:309a-17: ye shes zhes bya ba ni lug gi 'pho ba
T02D1419:309a-18: rnam par gzung bas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'di
T02D1419:309a-19: ni shes par bya ba 'di ni mi bden par
T02D1419:309a-21: gnyis pa khyu mchog gi 'pho ba la rab tu zhugs pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs te /
T02D1419:309a-22: rlung gi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par 'gro ba'o //
T02D1419:309a-23: gsum pa 'khrig pas mda'i gandi bzhin sems de'i gzugs su skye ba ste gzugs med pa bzhin no //
T02D1419:309a-24: bzhi pa ka rka tar 'ben gyi gzugs brnyan zhes
T02D1419:309a-25: bya ba ste dngos po thams cad 'byed par byed
T02D1419:309a-27: lnga pa seng ge'i 'pho bar rtse mo lnga'i bdag
T02D1419:309a-28: nyid cas bya ba ni sems rdo rje bde ba'i
T02D1419:309a-29: bdag nyid can rnam pa lnga 'bigs te 'dod pa
T02D1419:309a-30: lnga rnams te gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rjes
T02D1419:309a-32: drug pa bu mor khams drug 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D1419:309a-33: ba ni skyes bu chen po'i gang zag gi dga'
T02D1419:309a-34: ba skye ste byang chub kyi yid kyis so //
T02D1419:309a-35: bdun pa srang la rgya mtsho'i gzugs //
T02D1419:309a-36: zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i mdun rnams te ye
T02D1419:309a-37: shes kyi rgya mtsho la sogs pa sngon du bshad
T02D1419:309a-38: pa rnams te l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ro
T02D1419:309a-39: // brgyad pa sdig pa'i 'pho ba la padma zhes
T02D1419:309a-40: bya ba ni snying ga'i padma'i nam mkha' brgyad rnams
T02D1419:309a-41: de nyid dga' ba'i gzugs te rgyu ba dang mi
T02D1419:309a-42: rgyu bar bcas pa skye ba'o //
T02D1419:309b-0: dgu pa gzhu la bcud @309b len zhes bya ba
T02D1419:309b-1: ni rtsa dgu rnams su rab tu 'bab pa med
T02D1419:309b-2: pas lus kyi khams thams cad bde ba dang bcas
T02D1419:309b-3: pa nyid kyi bcud len du 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:309b-4: bcu pa chu srin la chu srin zla ba 'dod
T02D1419:309b-5: pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams khyad par du
T02D1419:309b-6: 'phags pas lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba
T02D1419:309b-7: ste bya ba thams cad la bcu pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1419:309b-9: bcu gcig pa bum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs zhes
T02D1419:309b-10: bya ba ni grol ba'i gzugs bzhi pa 'das pa
T02D1419:309b-11: nyid du skye ba ste khyad par gyi dga' ba'o
T02D1419:309b-12: // bcu gnyis pa nya'i 'pho bar rab tu zhugs
T02D1419:309b-13: pas la 'khor lo'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D1419:309b-14: la khyab 'jug gi rigs kyi gzugs kyi dga' ba
T02D1419:309b-15: thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'i gzugs nyid las byang chub
T02D1419:309b-16: kyi sa bon zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1419:309b-17: bcu gsum pa nyi ma 'char ba'i zas su dang /
T02D1419:309b-18: bcu bzhi pa zla ba 'char ba'i zas su ste /
T02D1419:309b-19: bco lnga pa r'a hu'i sbyor bas aa wa dh'u t'i mtshams thams cad du zhu bas so //
T02D1419:309b-20: bcu drug pa thig le'i ming can zhes bya ba
T02D1419:309b-21: ste de'i phyir bshad pa dus dang bral ba zhes
T02D1419:309b-22: bya ba ste de'i phyir rang gi rig pa zhes
T02D1419:309b-23: bya ba la sogs pas thams cad de'i mtshan nyid
T02D1419:309b-24: du shes pa'o // lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:309b-25: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:309b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1419:309b-27: pa ste thams cad legs par go bar zad do
T02D1419:309b-28: // dpal thams cad gsang ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa
T02D1419:309b-29: las dpal he ru ka'i yi ge'i rab tu sbyor
T02D1419:309b-30: bas rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga
T02D1419:309b-31: dang 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pas dga' ba'i gnas skabs
T02D1419:309b-32: rnam pa bcu drug dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1419:309b-33: bsgom pa dang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes
T02D1419:309b-34: 'char ba dang de'i cho ga'i khyad par bstan pa
T02D1419:309b-35: ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i
T02D1419:309b-37: / padma gar dbang phyag byas nas //
T02D1419:309b-38: lha rdzas kha zas byed pa ste //
T02D1419:309b-39: rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rab sbyor bas //
T02D1419:309b-40: las thams cad ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1419:309b-41: da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi bza' ba'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:309b-42: de nas bshad par bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:310a-0: @310a * // lus la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sku rdo
T02D1419:310a-1: rje la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis der yang dag
T02D1419:310a-2: par byung ba'i dpa' bo'i khams rnams kyi mngon par
T02D1419:310a-3: bza' ba ste de nyid rtogs pa dang bcas pas
T02D1419:310a-4: za ba'o // de yang padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D1419:310a-5: gis de ltar zhes bya ba na 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1419:310a-6: ba'i ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor pa 'dis
T02D1419:310a-7: 'byung ba ste de rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1419:310a-8: rtsa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste mdor na yi ge gnyis gnyis kyi bshad pa'o //
T02D1419:310a-9: padma'i don ni rtsa'i padma las yang dag par bshad
T02D1419:310a-10: de stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams te de
T02D1419:310a-11: rnams su gar bya ba ste /
T02D1419:310a-12: gar gyi yi ga dag gi ni srog gi rlung
T02D1419:310a-13: gi 'di rnams thams cad du kun du rgyu ba'i
T02D1419:310a-14: sna tshogs pa'i sems kyi spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1419:310a-15: gzugs dmigs pas gar mkhan no //
T02D1419:310a-16: dbang phyug gces bya ba ni dbang phyug gi yi ge ste /
T02D1419:310a-17: byang chub kyi sems kyi zhes bya ba ni kun
T02D1419:310a-18: du rgyu ba'i dus su thams cad du 'gengs par
T02D1419:310a-19: byed pas de rnams kyi nang du gnas pa ste
T02D1419:310a-20: ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i rang
T02D1419:310a-21: bzhin gyis so // bza' bar bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:310a-22: bsgom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1419:310a-23: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i dbus
T02D1419:310a-24: su lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs rnams kyi rtse na
T02D1419:310a-25: pa ste padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1419:310a-26: slar yang 'di'i rim pa ji lta bas yi ge re re'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1419:310a-27: pa yig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1419:310a-28: 'on kyang bshad pa 'dis srid pa dang mya ngan
T02D1419:310a-29: las 'das pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rab tu
T02D1419:310a-30: sbyor ba mdor bsdus par bya'o //
T02D1419:310a-31: gang gi lam gyis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya ba ste /
T02D1419:310a-32: de'i rgya che bar bya ba ni /
T02D1419:310a-33: bde mchog phyi ma zhes bya ba ste nges par brjod pa 'bum par ji ltar gsungs pa /
T02D1419:310a-34: de bzhin du thams cad shes par bya ste sangs
T02D1419:310a-35: rgyas kyi rgyur rang bzhin gyi chos 'di'am de la
T02D1419:310a-36: sogs par padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rtog par
T02D1419:310a-37: mtshams sbyor gyi skad kyi khyad par gsungs pas so
T02D1419:310a-38: // de'i phyir bgrod pa 'di rnams zhes bya ba
T02D1419:310b-0: la sogs bas de rnams @310b de bzhin du bshad
T02D1419:310b-1: // do // nam mkha' zhen pa'i sbyor bas zhes
T02D1419:310b-2: bya ba ni sprin gyi go skabs phye ba can
T02D1419:310b-3: gyi sbyor ba ste so sor bsdus pa la sogs
T02D1419:310b-4: pas du ba la sogs pa'i rtags bcu mtshon par
T02D1419:310b-5: // do // bya'o // rab tu gsal ba'i gzugs gar byed bzhin pa mthong bar 'gyur bas so //
T02D1419:310b-6: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la sogs pas gsungs pa /
T02D1419:310b-7: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rtogs sla'o //
T02D1419:310b-8: 'di bsgom pas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:310b-9: gcig tu na 'jig rten la sogs pa tsam 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D1419:310b-11: bsgrub pa byang chub shing drung du //
T02D1419:310b-12: zhes bya ba ste lte ba'i rtsa bar srog gi
T02D1419:310b-13: shing la brten pas rang gi sems las byung ba'i
T02D1419:310b-14: sangs rgyas kyang sgrub par byed de de'i tshe dbang
T02D1419:310b-15: du 'gyur ro // bdud 'joms pa ste rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gzhom pa byas so //
T02D1419:310b-17: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa las
T02D1419:310b-18: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rab tu sbyor bas
T02D1419:310b-19: dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i ston mo lus
T02D1419:310b-20: la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi rig pa'i rnam
T02D1419:310b-21: par rtog pa bza' ba dang mtshams sbyor gyi skad
T02D1419:310b-22: kyi khyad par gyis khams gsum de de bzhin du
T02D1419:310b-23: sangs rgyas nyid la sbyar ba dang dkyil 'khor lo
T02D1419:310b-24: bsgom pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las bsgrub pa
T02D1419:310b-25: dang mu stegs can rnams gzhug pa dang man ngag
T02D1419:310b-26: sna tshogs pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan
T02D1419:310b-27: pa ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis
T02D1419:310b-29: / rnam snang mdzad la phyag byas nas //
T02D1419:310b-30: gsal ba'i sku yi dngos po yis //
T02D1419:310b-31: dag pa'i sku ni 'thob pa ste //
T02D1419:310b-32: rul pa'i lus ni grol byed pa'o //
T02D1419:310b-33: da ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rab tu sbyor pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:310b-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:310b-35: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan nyid cas bya ba
T02D1419:310b-36: ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rab tu sbyor bas rnams
T02D1419:310b-37: kyis te de ltar 'di'i mdor bstan pa gsungs pa
T02D1419:310b-38: / gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang //
T02D1419:310b-40: 'dir gang gi tshe bstan bcos thams cad du rnams
T02D1419:311a-0: par snang mdzad gzugs kyi phung por gsungs @311a *
T02D1419:311a-2: /'dir de dang 'dra ba ma yin te /
T02D1419:311a-3: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
T02D1419:311a-4: ci'i phyir rnam par mdzad chen po ma yin pas
T02D1419:311a-5: gang gi phyir de'i gzugs las 'das pa ste spros
T02D1419:311a-6: pa thams cad dang bral ba gal te 'di dang
T02D1419:311a-7: 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi gzugs sprul pa ste de'i
T02D1419:311a-8: tshe de nyid ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin zhes
T02D1419:311a-10: de rnams la lha mo thams cad nyon cig bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
T02D1419:311a-11: de'i phyir ming gi yi ge rnams kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1419:311a-12: khyad par du gsal zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1419:311a-13: ste bee'i yi ge'i don thog ma nyid du bshad
T02D1419:311a-14: par bya ste / khyad par du gsal bar gyur
T02D1419:311a-15: bas de bzhin te bsgom par rtogs pa'i dus su
T02D1419:311a-16: gang 'bar ba ste ye shes kyi rnam pa'i gzugs
T02D1419:311a-17: par bya ste / so // de yang sems dpa'i chen po'i 'du shes can //
T02D1419:311a-18: zhes bya ba ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag
T02D1419:311a-19: nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po sbrul pa'i sku
T02D1419:311a-21: de ltar ro'i yi ge'i don gyis rnal 'byor pa
T02D1419:311a-22: rnams kyi ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo las brtan
T02D1419:311a-23: pa dang skye 'gro la sogs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1419:311a-24: gzugs su nges par 'gro ba ste /
T02D1419:311a-25: stobs che ba pha rol gnon par brtson pa chos dang chos nyid la yongs su gang bas so //
T02D1419:311a-26: de ltar sems can gyi don byas nas de rnams
T02D1419:311a-27: pa spu'i khung bu'i bu ga rnams kyi de bzhin
T02D1419:311a-29: de ltar rang dang gzhan gyi ye shes kyis 'dres par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:311a-30: de nyid rtsa'i yi ge'i don gyi rnal 'byor pa
T02D1419:311a-31: rnams kyi ye shes rnams gsal bar byed pa gsungs
T02D1419:311a-32: pa / g-yo ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:311a-33: de ltar srog 'gog pa byas pas zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i nang du thim par bya'o //
T02D1419:311a-34: de nas de dang 'dra bar mtha' med pa'i sbrul
T02D1419:311a-35: pa po rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i gzugs su
T02D1419:311a-36: rang nyid rang gis mthong ba'o //
T02D1419:311a-37: de ltar gdong gis gdong la zhes bya ba ni
T02D1419:311a-38: me long du son pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1419:311a-39: / de ltar slar yang skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par bzhag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:311a-40: mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste na'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
T02D1419:311a-41: mi po mi mo la sogs pa ni rkang gnyis
T02D1419:311a-42: dang rkang bzhin rnams kyis dang 'di rnams thams cad
T02D1419:311b-0: kyi gzugs su ste ji @311b ltar padma'i 'dab ma
T02D1419:311b-2: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ye shes yongs su bsgoms
T02D1419:311b-3: pas na rang gi bdag nyid yongs su shes pa
T02D1419:311b-4: tsam gyis kyang bag chags dang bcas pas 'ching ba
T02D1419:311b-5: ste / slar yang srog de dang 'dra ba ma yin te /
T02D1419:311b-6: gang gi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1419:311b-7: srog gis de ltar 'gro ba'i don byed de de'i
T02D1419:311b-8: nang du rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1419:311b-9: de'i phyir srog chen po rnams par snang mdzad chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1419:311b-10: de ltar rig pa'i ro'i lus las rnam par gdon
T02D1419:311b-11: no zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1419:311b-12: gzugs kyi tha ma la pa'i gzugs su rig par
T02D1419:311b-13: bya'o // de nyid mkhas pa rnams zhes bya ba
T02D1419:311b-14: ni de ltar srog gi rang bzhin nye bar mtshon
T02D1419:311b-15: bya'o // pas so // sbyor ba dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:311b-16: aa yig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:311b-17: yid kyis zhes bya ba ni bum pa can gyi sbyor bas yongs su bsdu bar bya ba ste /
T02D1419:311b-18: dbugs rgyu ba bskul bas srog rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs su mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1419:311b-19: de ltar h'um yig ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1419:311b-20: dbyung bar bya ba ste gsor ba'i sbyor ba dang
T02D1419:311b-21: ldan pas zhes bya ba ni gtong ba dang 'gengs
T02D1419:311b-22: pas so // de ltar dgad pa ni aom gyi
T02D1419:311b-23: yi ges te ngal so ba'i sems kyi gzugs su
T02D1419:311b-24: 'gyur te sems de lus yongs su gnas pas mtshon
T02D1419:311b-25: pas so // par bya'o // de ltar ha'i yi
T02D1419:311b-26: ge'i n'a da'i gzugs mchog gi dang po rnams su
T02D1419:311b-27: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems pa'i sku ye
T02D1419:311b-28: shes kyi dngos por sbrul par bya ste /
T02D1419:311b-29: sna'i rtse mo ste dbu mar de nyid bsgom pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1419:311b-30: chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus su zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T02D1419:311b-31: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa
T02D1419:311b-32: bsgom par bya ba ste sgrub thabs kyi rim pas
T02D1419:311b-33: so // 'dzag ces bya ba la sogs pa thams cad go sla'o //
T02D1419:311b-34: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa las
T02D1419:311b-35: rnam par snang mdzad kyi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor
T02D1419:311b-36: bas sna tshogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la
T02D1419:311b-37: sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1419:311b-38: 'khor lo bsgom pa dang rtsa thams cad du mi
T02D1419:311b-39: 'pho ba dang yan lag drug tu 'jug pa dang
T02D1419:311b-40: sna tshogs pa'i khams kyi mar khus byugs pa'i mtshan
T02D1419:312a-1: ga rgyas par bstan pa ste /
T02D1419:312a-2: rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1419:312a-4: // / dpa' bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid //
T02D1419:312a-5: dang por rdo rje sems btud nas //
T02D1419:312a-6: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams //
T02D1419:312a-7: gnas thams cad du khyab pa po'o //
T02D1419:312a-8: da ni dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1419:312a-9: gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa
T02D1419:312a-10: / de nas gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:312a-11: mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid pas gsang ba ste /
T02D1419:312a-12: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po
T02D1419:312a-13: la sogs pa'i spyod yul min pa'i ye shes te
T02D1419:312a-14: / de yang mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min
T02D1419:312a-15: zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:312a-16: don sngon du song zin to //
T02D1419:312a-17: de ltar bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
T02D1419:312a-19: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:312a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas //
T02D1419:312a-21: zhes bya ba ni ming gi yi ge'i rab tu
T02D1419:312a-22: sbyor ba ste ming gi yi ge'i rab tu sbyor
T02D1419:312a-23: ba pull'ir la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du ji
T02D1419:312a-24: ltar yongs su gnas pa ste /
T02D1419:312a-26: rdo rje mi phyed ye shes so //
T02D1419:312a-27: zhes bya ba ste badzra'i yi ge dag gi don to //
T02D1419:312a-28: de'i phyir rdo rje'i sgras dbyer med pa'i ye shes
T02D1419:312a-29: te chos kyi sku gcig tu nges pa'i sems so
T02D1419:312a-30: // sems dpa'i sgras sems dpa'i snying por ston pas
T02D1419:312a-31: dbye ba med par nye bar spyod pa sems can
T02D1419:312a-32: gyi don du rab tu 'jug pa des stong pa
T02D1419:312a-33: nyid dang snying rje mi phyed pa rnal 'byor pa
T02D1419:312a-34: rnams kyi lam du rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu
T02D1419:312a-35: grags pa ste bcom ldan 'das des sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1419:312a-36: gnas su brten pa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyu'i
T02D1419:312a-38: zla ba rdo rje rab sbyor bas //
T02D1419:312a-40: zla ba ni bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1419:312a-41: de nyid slar yang rdo rje zhes bya ba ste
T02D1419:312a-42: rdo rje'i lam nas 'pho ba med pa de dag
T02D1419:312a-43: gi rab tu sbyor bas gnas kyi ming can gyi
T02D1419:312a-44: rtsa 'di rnams thams cad kyi khar dgug pa ste
T02D1419:312a-45: / bgrod pas bka' bsgo bya zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T02D1419:312a-46: de ltar lus la gnas la sogs pa sbyar bas
T02D1419:312a-47: re re'i phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid du rgyu
T02D1419:312a-49: 'bab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:312a-50: de ltar dngos grub nyi shu rtsa bzhi ster ba
T02D1419:312b-0: po rdo rje @312b sems dpa' ste de de bzhin
T02D1419:312b-1: du bshad do // 'di ni go sla'o //
T02D1419:312b-2: 'on kyang gnas 'di rnams su dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1419:312b-3: 'byor ma rnams kyi khams dang rtsa'i sbyor bas lhag
T02D1419:312b-5: de rnams kyi rang gi sems la ji ltar gsungs pa ster ba'o //
T02D1419:312b-6: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:312b-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:312b-8: khams las byung ba'i ro chen po //
T02D1419:312b-9: zhes bya ba ni srub pa dang srub pas lha rdzas kyi ro ye shes su bshad pa'o //
T02D1419:312b-10: de'i de ltar khyad par du byed pa gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1419:312b-11: dngos po med min zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1419:312b-12: ham gi yi ge gzhom du med pa rdo rje
T02D1419:312b-13: sems dpa'i gzugs su bshad pa ste de ltar ma
T02D1419:312b-14: lus pa mdor bsdus pa'i sgyu ma chen po'i chos
T02D1419:312b-15: su bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par bstan par 'gyur
T02D1419:312b-16: ro // lhag ma sngon ji lta ba ste 'di ni nges pa'o //
T02D1419:312b-17: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa las
T02D1419:312b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga'i rab tu sbyor ba'i
T02D1419:312b-19: yi ges phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyor
T02D1419:312b-20: ba dag gis gnas la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster
T02D1419:312b-21: ba po dpa' bo gnyis su med pa dang dkyil
T02D1419:312b-22: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang lha rdzas kyi
T02D1419:312b-23: ro nye bar spyod pas gsang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:312b-24: tshig rnams kyi nges pa'i chig rnams dang n'a da
T02D1419:312b-25: las byung zhing bskyed pa thim pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1419:312b-26: bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid n'a da'i
T02D1419:312b-27: yi ge dang yi ge med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D1419:312b-28: rnam par bzhag pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan pa
T02D1419:312b-29: ste rab tu byed pa nyid shu rtsa bzhi pa'i
T02D1419:312b-31: / dpal ldan dus [?] me char sprin 'dra //
T02D1419:312b-32: bdud thams cad la zhabs bkod gang //
T02D1419:312b-33: phyag dang zhal dang zhabs rnams kyis //
T02D1419:312b-35: rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i //
T02D1419:312b-36: bdud tshogs dgra de la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1419:312b-37: gnyis med dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1419:312b-38: dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas de la'o //
T02D1419:312b-39: da ni nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dpa' bo thams
T02D1419:312b-40: cad kyi gtso bo'i rnam pa'i gzugs dpal he ru
T02D1419:312b-41: ka yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje bshad
T02D1419:312b-42: pa zhes bya ba dpa' bo thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1419:312b-43: pos spyir bsdus pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:312b-44: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:313a-1: bya ba ni ji ltar sngon du bshad pa'i rigs
T02D1419:313a-2: pas nas tshogs pa'i las kyi tshogs kyi phyi dang
T02D1419:313a-3: nang gi bdag nyid can du shes par bya ba
T02D1419:313a-5: dpa' bo'i gtso bo zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo
T02D1419:313a-6: 'di rnams thams cad kyi gtso bo ji ltar dpal
T02D1419:313a-7: bco lnga bar bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
T02D1419:313a-8: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid nyams dga' ba dang
T02D1419:313a-9: dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su mdor bsdus
T02D1419:313a-11: de ltar 'dir byas pas ci bya zhe na /
T02D1419:313a-13: kun spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:313a-14: 'dir ni kun du spyod ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdor bstan pa tsam ste /
T02D1419:313a-15: 'on kyang rnam pa sna tshogs par bshad par bya
T02D1419:313a-16: ba ste de'i cho ga rgyas par bstan pa bshad
T02D1419:313a-17: par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
T02D1419:313a-18: gang gi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor
T02D1419:313a-19: gyi dbang phyug rnams kyi gsang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1419:313a-20: go 'phang la gnas pa ste de rnams kyi kun
T02D1419:313a-21: du spyod pa'i cho ga sngon du bshad pa zhes
T02D1419:313a-22: bya ba la sogs pas khams sna tshogs pa 'bab
T02D1419:313a-23: pa'i sbyor bas nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams re re
T02D1419:313a-24: la gsum gsum ste de rnams kyis slar yang brgyad
T02D1419:313a-25: brgyad do // de yang nyi shu rtsa bzhi sum 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:313a-26: de ltar tshad zlum po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba
T02D1419:313a-27: ni 'khor lo'i rnam par sbyor bar rtsa rnams kyis
T02D1419:313a-28: sbyor ba las byung ba'i thig le'i gzugs rnams gzhag
T02D1419:313a-29: par bya ba ste ji lta ba'i rim pas phyi
T02D1419:313a-30: rol du yang mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1419:313a-31: de rnams kyi gnas gsungs pa /
T02D1419:313a-32: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1419:313a-33: de ltar rdo rje'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams
T02D1419:313a-34: su'o // kun du 'pho zhes bya ba ni rim
T02D1419:313a-35: pa ji lta ba rnams su shar la sogs pa
T02D1419:313a-36: thig le'i phyi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su yongs
T02D1419:313a-38: ye shes zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D1419:313a-40: 'dir mdor na bsam pa las 'das pa'i kun du spyod pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:313a-41: da ni bsam pa dang bcas pa'i kun du spyod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:313a-42: 'di rnams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:313a-43: 'dir dpa' bo rnams kyi thim pa dang longs spyod pa dang bdag tu byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:313a-44: p'urna gi rir longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-0: dz'a landha ra ra thim @313b mo ;
T02D1419:313b-1: / aa rbu dar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-2: aodyana du khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-3: dz'a landhar ra longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-5: p'urna gi rir bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-6: aarbu dar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-7: aoodya na du longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-9: dz'a la nadha ra ra bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-10: p'urna gi rir khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-14: dz'a landha rar khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:313b-15: de bzhin du go d'a pa r'ir longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-16: r'a me shva rir thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-17: m'a la bar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-18: de b'i ko tir khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-19: r'a me shva rar longs spyod do//
T02D1419:313b-20: de d'i ko tir thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-21: goo d'a wa ri'i bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-22: m'a la war khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-23: de w'i ko tir longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-25: ra me shva rar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-26: go d'a b'a rir khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-27: m'a la bar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-28: go da ba rir thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-29: de w'i ko ti bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-30: r'a me shvar ra khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:313b-31: de bzhin du k'ama ru par longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-33: ko sa lar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-34: tri sha ku nar rgyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-36: tri sha ku nar thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-37: k'a ma r'u par bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-38: ko sa lar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-39: tri sha ku nar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-41: ao ter bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-42: k'a ma r'u par khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-43: ko sa lar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-44: ka ma r'u par thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-45: tri sha kun ra bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-46: ao ter khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:313b-47: de bzhin du ka ling+gar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-49: hi m'a la yar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-50: k'a nytsir khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-53: ka ling+gar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-54: hi m'a la yar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-56: hi m'a la yar thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-57: la mba kar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-58: ka ling+gar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-59: hi ma' la yar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-61: k'a nytsir bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-62: lambh'a kar khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:313b-63: de bzhin du phar ta bu rir longs spyod do //
T02D1419:313b-64: gri ha de ba dang thim mo //
T02D1419:313b-65: su barna'a dv'ai bar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:313b-66: soor' shatar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:313b-67: gri de btar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:314a-2: / pre ta pu rir bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:314a-3: su barnna dv'i par khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:314a-4: soo r'a shtara longs spyod do //
T02D1419:314a-5: su barnna dv'i par thim mo //
T02D1419:314a-6: gri ha de ba nyar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:314a-7: pre ta bu rir khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:314a-8: su brnan dv'i bar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:314a-9: phre ta bu rir thim mo //
T02D1419:314a-10: soor shtara bdag tu byed do ;
T02D1419:314a-11: / gri ha de ba tar khyab bdag nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1419:314a-12: de bzhin du n'a ga rar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:314a-14: ku lu tar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:314a-15: mi rur khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:314a-16: sindhur longs spyod de / ma rur thim mo //
T02D1419:314a-17: na ga rar bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:314a-18: ku lu tar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:314a-22: na ga rar khyab bdag nyid do //
T02D1419:314a-23: ku lu tar longs spyod do //
T02D1419:314a-25: ma rur bdag tu byed do //
T02D1419:314a-26: sindhur khyab bdag nyid ces bya ba la bzhi bzhi
T02D1419:314a-27: g-yas pa dang g-yon skor du ji ltar bshad pa'i
T02D1419:314a-28: rim pas go bar bya ste dpa' bo nye shu
T02D1419:314a-29: rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gnas rnams sub com ldan 'das
T02D1419:314a-31: dus de rnams su ji ltar bshad pa'i thod pa'i
T02D1419:314a-32: dum bu la sogs par le'i 'dir bshad pa'i rim
T02D1419:314a-33: pas so sor gtso bo nyid du longs spyod do
T02D1419:314a-34: // de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad
T02D1419:314a-35: pa 'di byas pas bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin
T02D1419:314a-36: pa'i dngos po'i gzugs skad cig ma nyid pas gang
T02D1419:314a-37: na yang med pa ste des kyang skad cig gis
T02D1419:314a-38: sna tshogs pa'i dpal bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1419:314a-40: de rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:314a-42: dus de rnams su ji ltar slar yang skabs ci
T02D1419:314a-43: 'dra ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1419:314a-44: zhe na / de'i tshe de rnams kyi dga' ba'i
T02D1419:314a-45: glu'i sngags kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i skabs gsungs pa
T02D1419:314a-46: zhe na / / cig pu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'di ni go sla'o //
T02D1419:314a-47: de ltar de kho na nyid nye shu rtsa nga'i
T02D1419:314a-48: bdag nyid rgyud thams cad du rnyed par dka' ba
T02D1419:314a-49: byang chub chen po ster ba po dgos pa'i dgos
T02D1419:314a-51: de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ru //
T02D1419:314a-52: 'jig rten khams rnams yongs su byung //
T02D1419:314a-53: longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad pa rnams //
T02D1419:314a-54: rnal 'byor byis rnams bgrod bya min //
T02D1419:314b-1: de rnams bgro byar nye bar bstan //
T02D1419:314b-2: lhan skyes dus su 'di bgrod de //
T02D1419:314b-3: mchog tu zag pa med bzung ba //
T02D1419:314b-4: rang kun sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1419:314b-5: der ni gnas su rab tu bshad //
T02D1419:314b-6: rgyud thams cad du gsang ba ste //
T02D1419:314b-7: de nyid nyi shu lnga skyes pa'o //
T02D1419:314b-8: de yis thams cad du bdag med ;
T02D1419:314b-9: / dbang po tshar bcad pas yod de //
T02D1419:314b-10: 'jig rten du ni phyag rgya yi //
T02D1419:314b-11: grub yod sngon skyi ba rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D1419:314b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs pas rgya che'o //
T02D1419:314b-13: 'di skad gsungs zhas bya ba la sogs pa'i bcom
T02D1419:314b-14: ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo rang gi skyon
T02D1419:314b-17: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
T02D1419:314b-18: rgyal po chen po'i 'grel gru gzings las thod pa'i
T02D1419:314b-19: dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa
T02D1419:314b-20: lnga'i rang gi ming sngon du song bas de kho
T02D1419:314b-21: na nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rnam par bzhag pa dang
T02D1419:314b-22: sna tshogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang man ngag
T02D1419:314b-23: sna tshogs pa'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1419:314b-24: kyi sems bskyed pa dang rgyud thams cad kyi don
T02D1419:314b-25: ston pa po nyid pas de'i dgongs pa 'grub pa'i
T02D1419:314b-26: cho ga' [*ga'i?] mtshan nyid kyi skabs thams cad gsang
T02D1419:314b-27: ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba rgyas par bstan pa
T02D1419:314b-28: ste le'u lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1419:314b-30: // / byang chub mchog gi byed pa ste //
T02D1419:314b-31: dam tshig rdo rje phyag byas nas //
T02D1419:314b-32: dam tshig la sogs sbyor ldan par //
T02D1419:314b-33: byang chub rdo rje yis gsungs so //
T02D1419:314b-34: rgyud thams cad kyi bsdus pa'i don //
T02D1419:314b-35: dad po'i sbyor ba'i rgyas gdab pa //
T02D1419:314b-36: lhag ma'i le'u rnams kyi ni 'dir //
T02D1419:314b-37: 'grel pa nges par bshad par bya //
T02D1419:314b-38: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dus rtag tu
T02D1419:314b-39: bstod pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig
T02D1419:314b-40: bshad pa gsungs / de nas rnal 'byor ma dang
T02D1419:314b-41: dpa' bo rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1419:314b-42: bshad pa gsungs / / de ltar 'khor rnams kyang rang gi stan las langs te /
T02D1419:314b-43: kyang gi sgras lha dang lha ma yin dang mi
T02D1419:314b-44: la sogs pa dang bcas pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1419:314b-45: khyab bdag chen po sna tshogs pa sprul pa'i sku
T02D1419:314b-46: can la bstod pa byed pa de nyid gsungs pa
T02D1419:314b-47: / 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas //
T02D1419:314b-48: khyid dang gcig gi gzugs su gnas //
T02D1419:315a-1: tshigs su bcad pa drug rnams kyis yon tan dam par gyur ba grags par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1419:315a-2: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni rdor je
T02D1419:315a-3: 'chang chen po rab tu dbyes pas mchod pa bzhi
T02D1419:315a-4: ston par mdzad pa ste phyi dang nang gi bdag
T02D1419:315a-7: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de
T02D1419:315a-8: ltar thog ma'i mchod pa dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:315a-9: gnyis med de ltar zhes bya ba ste 'dir dkyil
T02D1419:315a-11: de bzhin du mdor bsdus pas gang rtul tshong yi
T02D1419:315a-12: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byas pa'am 'jig rten thams
T02D1419:315a-13: cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i rkyen gyi
T02D1419:315a-14: bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1419:315a-15: gnyis pa dkyil 'khor de rnams la mchod pa byas
T02D1419:315a-16: pa gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni dbye
T02D1419:315a-17: ba med pa'i gzugs kyis ji ltar mar la mar
T02D1419:315a-18: zhugs pa de bzhin du nye bar spyod pa lnga
T02D1419:315a-19: la sogs pa rnams kyis gnyis su med pa'i don
T02D1419:315a-20: du gnyer ba rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D1419:315a-22: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ste /
T02D1419:315a-23: phyi ni sal spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug pa
T02D1419:315a-24: rnams kyi dang de bzhin du nam mkha' la spyod
T02D1419:315a-26: glang po dang rta la sogs pa ni sa la spyod pa rnams so //
T02D1419:315a-27: mkha' la spyod pa'i ni nam mkha' lding la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1419:315a-28: de rnams kyi rdzas ni sha la sogs pa'i khams sna tshogs rnams kyis so //
T02D1419:315a-29: de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1419:315a-30: gcig ni mi rnams khyi ro'i lus kyi khams thams cad do //
T02D1419:315a-31: gnyis pa ni mi dang mi mo dang gi khu
T02D1419:315a-32: pa dang khrag la sogs pa byung ba'i khams rnams
T02D1419:315a-33: te de ltar ma lus pa yengs su bzung nas
T02D1419:315a-34: 'khrul 'khor rnams su bdud rtsi dbab par bya'o zhes
T02D1419:315a-35: bya ba ni man ngag go //
T02D1419:315a-36: bdud rtse des bdag nyid la yang mchod pa bya
T02D1419:315a-37: ste sbu gu'i sbyor bas zhib pa'i btung ba 'thungs
T02D1419:315a-38: pas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis mchog ster bar 'gyur
T02D1419:315a-39: ro // de ltar bza' bya ba zhes bya ba
T02D1419:315a-40: la sogs pas skye bo dam pa 'dus pa rnams
T02D1419:315a-41: dang lhan cig de'i dbus su dga' ba rnams kyis
T02D1419:315a-42: rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig gnyis su med
T02D1419:315b-0: bzhi pa chos zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa @315b gsungs pa /
T02D1419:315b-1: chos zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang ston pa'o //
T02D1419:315b-2: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1419:315b-3: kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ste de
T02D1419:315b-4: dag bzung bas sgrub pa po rnams kyis rtag tu
T02D1419:315b-7: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa'i dag gi khyad par du byed pa'o //
T02D1419:315b-8: de bzhin du rnal 'byor rnams yid su rtag tu rnal 'byor gyi sngom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1419:315b-9: bgom par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1419:315b-10: gan yang ci yag rung ba'i gnas rnams su bza'
T02D1419:315b-11: ba la sogs pa byed pa na rnal 'byor pas
T02D1419:315b-12: de'i tshe'i gnas su'am tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su
T02D1419:315b-13: thog ma nyid du lag pa g-yon pas mdun du
T02D1419:315b-14: bsang yid kyis su ra la sogs pas mandala byas
T02D1419:315b-15: te 'di'i dbus su slar yang gru gsum pa bya'o
T02D1419:315b-16: // de bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su
T02D1419:315b-17: gyur pa gang gi tshe bdag nyid kyi dbus kyi
T02D1419:315b-18: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs rnams par spros nas gru
T02D1419:315b-19: gsum pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams
T02D1419:315b-20: kyis bcas pa bzhugs nas ji ltar 'dod pas de
T02D1419:315b-21: rnams kyis gsol du gzugs pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D1419:315b-22: // // lhag ma dam tshig gi sdom pa ste thams cad rtogs par sla'o //
T02D1419:315b-24: gnyis med pa mchog tu gsang ni //
T02D1419:315b-25: mchod pa yid ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1419:315b-26: gnyis med dkyil 'khor bdag ldan pas /
T02D1419:315b-27: gnyis pa'i sbyor ba spangs pa las //
T02D1419:315b-28: thams cad de'i rang bzhin gro ste /
T02D1419:315b-29: mchod byas mchod pa mchod pa'o //
T02D1419:315b-30: sna tshogs rdzas kyi nal 'byor ba ;
T02D1419:315b-31: / rgas dang 'chi ba bad par byed //
T02D1419:315b-32: man ngag gnyis su med byang chub //
T02D1419:315b-33: blo ldan 'thung ba pos btung bya //
T02D1419:315b-34: bza' btung la sogs 'jig rten du //
T02D1419:315b-36: rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor skyes pa //
T02D1419:315b-38: de rnams sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur ro //
T02D1419:315b-39: sgrub pa po yi the tshom med /
T02D1419:315b-40: chos ni rnag don gzhan don du //
T02D1419:315b-41: rnal 'byor ldan pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1419:315b-42: thams cad de'i rang bzhin bgrod dang //
T02D1419:315b-43: mchod pa du ma de bzhin du //
T02D1419:315b-44: de ltar mnyes pa gang byed pa //
T02D1419:315b-45: rtag tu bha ga'i dbus su bya //
T02D1419:316a-2: mkha' 'gro la sogs gzugs brnyan lo //
T02D1419:316a-3: rang bdag rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D1419:316a-4: de rnams thams cad de yis 'grub //
T02D1419:316a-5: bdud rtsi sbyor bas byas pa yis //
T02D1419:316a-6: phyag rgya dag gis snod gzung do //
T02D1419:316a-8: yang na rnal 'byor ma la sngar ;
T02D1419:316a-9: / de yi lhag mas dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1419:316a-10: phyi nang rang bdag gis blang ngo //
T02D1419:316a-11: gtor ma 'byung po thams cad la //
T02D1419:316a-13: chu skyes kha yi bya ba ste //
T02D1419:316a-14: chos kyi dbyings ni blta bar bya'o //
T02D1419:316a-15: de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa //
T02D1419:316a-16: dam tshig sngom pa rnal 'byor ba //
T02D1419:316a-17: dngos grub don du rtag bya ba //
T02D1419:316a-18: thun mtshams bzhi ru gsungs pa'o //
T02D1419:316a-19: rgyud dang rtog pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D1419:316a-20: bstan bcos sna tshogs thams cad du //
T02D1419:316a-21: gzhung smra ba ni 'grub don du //
T02D1419:316a-22: dam tshig sngom pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1419:316a-23: lhag ma med cing lus med pa'i //
T02D1419:316a-24: rdo rje sems sogs sngags rigs 'grub //
T02D1419:316a-25: de phyir dam tshig sdom pa kun //
T02D1419:316a-26: sdom pa mang po bsgrub par bya //
T02D1419:316a-28: la lar yang ni dgon dang shang mang dang //
T02D1419:316a-29: skyed tshal ri dang skye bo spangs pa dang //
T02D1419:316a-30: dur khrod drag po ri ni mang po dang //
T02D1419:316a-31: chu 'gram de bzhin rgya mtshor gnas po dang //
T02D1419:316a-32: gang dang gang du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1419:316a-33: de dang der ni don dam pa yi mchod pa dang ;
T02D1419:316a-34: / sdom pa kun gyi bdag nyid du ni de ltar du //
T02D1419:316a-35: rnal 'byor pa yis gnyis med gnas par bya //
T02D1419:316a-36: rnal 'byor ma ni shes rab can gyis mchod //
T02D1419:316a-37: ji ltar thob pa'i 'du byed bya ba'o //
T02D1419:316a-38: bshad ba dang ni gci ba bza' bar bya //
T02D1419:316a-39: sgrub pa po ni sa gzhir rnyed dka' ste //
T02D1419:316a-40: de ni 'di thams cad kyis phyag byar 'os //
T02D1419:316a-41: khams gsum rnams su mthu stobs chen po ste //
T02D1419:316a-42: ji srid srid pa yongs su 'bab pa na //
T02D1419:316a-43: de yis khyad par 'phags pa'i lam du 'gyur //
T02D1419:316a-45: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
T02D1419:316a-46: rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las bstod
T02D1419:316a-47: pa'i ngag dang mchod pa bzhi dang dam tshig dang
T02D1419:316a-48: sngom pa bsten pa'i bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa'i
T02D1419:316a-49: cho ga'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sbyor
T02D1419:316a-50: ba'i dang po dang mthang de'i dgos pas gnyis su
T02D1419:316a-51: med pa'i bsgrub pa rgyas par bshad pa ste le'u
T02D1419:316a-52: lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1419:316b-0: // / da ni rgyud kyi @316b mtshan nyid byung ba
T02D1419:316b-1: dang nye bar sdud pa dag gi gnas skabs gsungs
T02D1419:316b-2: pa / 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1419:316b-3: rab tu byung ba ni rab ni mang po'i don ste byung ba'o //
T02D1419:316b-5: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo sngom pa la sogs
T02D1419:316b-6: pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams su ste 'chad par
T02D1419:316b-7: 'gyur ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
T02D1419:316b-8: la sogs pa'i ming yang shin tu rnyed par dka'
T02D1419:316b-9: ba'o // mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1419:316b-10: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams kyi
T02D1419:316b-11: man ngag bsdus pa'i de kho na nyid yongs su
T02D1419:316b-12: rdzogs pa'o // mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs ;
T02D1419:316b-13: / zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi lta pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1419:316b-14: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can //
T02D1419:316b-15: zhes bya ba ni rgyud thams cad gang bshad pa 'di brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1419:316b-16: brjod pa po la sogs pa'i 'brel ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1419:316b-17: de thams cad sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid
T02D1419:316b-18: can no // gnyis su med pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang /
T02D1419:316b-19: gnyis su med ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro zhes
T02D1419:316b-20: bya ba ni ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1419:316b-22: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni de'i tshad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02D1419:316b-23: de rnams kyis rgyud thams cad gnyis su med par
T02D1419:316b-24: bsdus ba'i don gyis sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag
T02D1419:316b-25: nyid kyi sbyor ba bstan pa zhes bya bar dgongs
T02D1419:316b-26: so // 'di rnams kyi 'di thams cad kyi yang
T02D1419:316b-27: rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni rtsa ba'i mdo
T02D1419:316b-28: sde de nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye
T02D1419:316b-29: shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1419:316b-30: 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'jig
T02D1419:316b-31: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang chig gi
T02D1419:316b-32: rgyan 'dus pa ste bsdus pa'i gzugs su bsdu ba
T02D1419:316b-33: byas nas thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1419:316b-34: de yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi zhal
T02D1419:316b-35: la gnas zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i bstan
T02D1419:316b-36: bcos nye bar spyod pa la sogs par gnas pa
T02D1419:316b-37: ste gang rnams de rnams de de bzhin du bshad
T02D1419:316b-38: do // za ma tog ni gnas te de rnams kyi lus so //
T02D1419:316b-39: ya ga thams cad cas bya ba ni aa'i yi ge la sogs pa'i dbyangs rnams 'jog pa'o //
T02D1419:317a-0: ste'i yi ges kyang dngos po thams cad kyi ming la sogs pa'i 'du shes @317a * //
T02D1419:317a-1: rnams bskyed pa'i gnas te sprul pa gnyis kyis so //
T02D1419:317a-2: de ltar 'di rnams thams cad kyi chen po ste
T02D1419:317a-3: rgyud chen po mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa
T02D1419:317a-4: 'dir 'dus pa'i gzugs su 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa
T02D1419:317a-5: drug gi rtsa ba'i mdo sde rnam par 'chad pa
T02D1419:317a-6: por 'gyur ro // rgya che bar ni du ma'o ;
T02D1419:317a-7: / mdor bsdus pas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
T02D1419:317a-8: ni chos kyi phung po'i tshad de ni nges pa'o
T02D1419:317a-9: // 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi rgyud rgya
T02D1419:317a-10: chen po de'i dbus nas yang yongs su bsdus pa'i
T02D1419:317a-11: gzugs snying po lta bu chung du mkha' 'gro rgya
T02D1419:317a-12: mtsho de ltar 'di'i ming du bshad pa'o //
T02D1419:317a-13: ri rab kyi rdul zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1419:317a-14: rgyun 'chad pa med par rab tu 'bab pa ste
T02D1419:317a-15: de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1419:317a-16: slar yang rtsod pa'i dus su rgyud chen po mngon
T02D1419:317a-17: par brjod pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa
T02D1419:317a-19: de'i nang nas slar yang rdo rje phag mo la
T02D1419:317a-20: sogs pa ma mo 'dus pa rnams kyis rgyud 'di
T02D1419:317a-21: rdo rje'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das la thos pas
T02D1419:317a-22: phan tshun rjes su bstan pa byas nas bsdus pa
T02D1419:317a-23: mdzad pa ste gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
T02D1419:317a-24: de la mngon par dga' ba ste /
T02D1419:317a-25: tshig 'di la zhes bya ba ni gzhung gi tshig gi tshang la yang ngo //
T02D1419:317a-26: lhag ma gzhan pa'i sems can rnams 'grol zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsungs so //
T02D1419:317a-27: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1419:317a-28: ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1419:317a-29: sngom pa zhes bya ba ni sngom ba rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1419:317a-30: bya ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1419:317a-31: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid rgya mtsho ste //
T02D1419:317a-32: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni rgyud lnga po 'di
T02D1419:317a-33: rnams la mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di
T02D1419:317a-34: gtso bo ste rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyud lnga dang
T02D1419:317a-35: mnyam par rgya mtsho drug por mdor bsdus pa rgyud
T02D1419:317a-36: kyi rgyal po gzhan gyi ming can no //
T02D1419:317a-37: de'i gru gzings ni pha rol du 'gro bar byed pa ste /
T02D1419:317a-38: ba yig bzang po'i gdong rnams la //
T02D1419:317a-39: dus thams cad du dran pa ste //
T02D1419:317a-40: aom yig bsgom pa'i lam du ni //
T02D1419:317a-41: bdag nyid n'a da'i nang du thim //
T02D1419:317a-42: hi yig phan pa skye ba ste //
T02D1419:317a-43: rang gzhan don ni mnyam don can //
T02D1419:317a-44: ta yig dngos po thams cad rnams //
T02D1419:317a-46: sems can rjes su 'dzin pa legs //
T02D1419:317a-47: byis pa nyid ni spong ba ste //
T02D1419:317a-48: gru gzings 'grel pa gang ldan pa /
T02D1419:317b-0: @317b 'khor ba'i dba' rlabs las brgal lo //
T02D1419:317b-1: rgyal ba kun dang de'i sras dang //
T02D1419:317b-2: thams cad kyis ni bzod par rigs //
T02D1419:317b-3: rnal 'byor ma chogs dpal rnams dang //
T02D1419:317b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha //
T02D1419:317b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor rnams dang //
T02D1419:317b-7: 'jig rten pa sngags lha rnams dang //
T02D1419:317b-10: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu kun dang //
T02D1419:317b-11: gang du bstan pa la dga' ba'i //
T02D1419:317b-12: srog chags gzugs can thams cad kyis //
T02D1419:317b-13: mtshan blangs pa yi skyon la ni //
T02D1419:317b-14: de dag kun gyis bzod par mdzod /
T02D1419:317b-15: rgyal ba rnams kyis lam gsungs pa'i //
T02D1419:317b-16: rgyud du 'ga' zhig ma shes par //
T02D1419:317b-18: bdag la so sor bzod pa mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-19: rnal 'byor ma sogs pa'i ye shes //
T02D1419:317b-21: bshad pa mkhyen pa yi ni 'khor //
T02D1419:317b-22: thams cad kyis ni bzod pa mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-23: 'jig rten pa sogs de rnams kun //
T02D1419:317b-24: rgol dang phyir rgol 'joms pa yi //
T02D1419:317b-25: grub pa'i dbang po chen po rnams //
T02D1419:317b-26: nga rgyal byed pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1419:317b-27: 'khor lo sngom pa'i mthar son pa'i //
T02D1419:317b-29: rnal 'byor ye shes gsal mi gsal //
T02D1419:317b-30: thams cad kyis ni bzod par mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-31: 'dus pa la sogs gzhan gyis ni //
T02D1419:317b-32: sbyor ba bsreg pa gang byas pa //
T02D1419:317b-33: de la'ang rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun //
T02D1419:317b-34: bdag la rtag tu bzod par mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-35: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin ston pa //
T02D1419:317b-37: gang du su dag spyod yul pa'am //
T02D1419:317b-38: mngon sum dang ni ring gnas pa //
T02D1419:317b-39: de rnams gnang ba blangs nas ni //
T02D1419:317b-40: myur du sems can don brtson la //
T02D1419:317b-41: des na bdag la bzod par mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-42: rdo rje'i grogs mched thams cad dang //
T02D1419:317b-43: mkhas ba'i skyes bu de bzhin du //
T02D1419:317b-44: bdag cag snyan dang gas mkhan rnams kyis //
T02D1419:317b-45: gzhung gi sdeb sbyor nyams sogs sam //
T02D1419:317b-46: don ma shes pa nyid rnams la ;
T02D1419:317b-47: / tshig rkang tsam zhig bcom pa ste //
T02D1419:317b-48: bdag la kun gyis bzod par mdzod //
T02D1419:317b-50: rnam par dpyad pas mngon legs na //
T02D1419:317b-51: gnyis su med ldan ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1419:317b-52: legs so pa yi dag 'dir byin //
T02D1419:317b-53: mkha' 'gro'i zho ni bsrubs ba las //
T02D1419:318a-2: de yi bsod rnams kyis 'jig rten //
T02D1419:318a-3: rdo rje 'dzin nyid thob par shog / ma dang pha sogs gnyen bshes dang //
T02D1419:318a-4: dge ba'i grogs po de bzhin du //
T02D1419:318a-5: byang chub kyi ni yul du bzhud //
T02D1419:318a-6: lhan cig skyes par rol cing mnos //
T02D1419:318a-7: sku gsum la sogs rgyu ru ni //
T02D1419:318a-8: thams cad kyi ni chos bstan gyis //
T02D1419:318a-9: sna tshogs skyes ba'i rab dang ni //
T02D1419:318a-10: sprul pa por ni 'gyur par shog //
T02D1419:318a-11: de la gnas nas rang gzhan don //
T02D1419:318a-12: mnyam pa med pas sal gyis //
T02D1419:318a-13: tshad med pa yi bde rnams su //
T02D1419:318a-14: de ni rab tu 'jug par mdzod //
T02D1419:318a-15: gang yang gzhan gyi sems can gyis //
T02D1419:318a-16: bdag gis yongs bshad 'di thos dang //
T02D1419:318a-17: reg dang gang gzhan thams cad kyis //
T02D1419:318a-18: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / de rnams lus 'di nyid la ni //
T02D1419:318a-19: sangs rgyas nyid du rtag gyur cig / dpal mkha'
T02D1419:318a-20: 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
T02D1419:318a-21: chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rgyud gyi [*kyi]
T02D1419:318a-22: mtshan nyid bskyed pa dang yongs su bsdu ba la
T02D1419:318a-23: sogs pa'i cho ga'i rnam par gzhag pa bcom ldan
T02D1419:318a-24: 'das kyis rgyas par bstan pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1419:318a-25: ri bong gi rtags can gyi rigs la dga' pa
T02D1419:318a-26: padma rdo rje gnyis su med par 'byung ba'i ming
T02D1419:318a-27: can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bka' lung gis
T02D1419:318a-29: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
T02D1419:318a-30: rgyal po chen po'i 'grel ba gru gzings zhes bya
T02D1419:318a-31: ba grub pa'i slob dpon padma rdo rje'i zhabs kyis
T02D1419:318a-34: // / gzhung gi mtshan nyid nyams pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgyad rnams so //
T02D1419:318a-36: dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yam bu'i
T02D1419:318a-37: grong khyer gyi dbus yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i
T02D1419:318a-38: gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi bani ta rdo
T02D1419:318a-39: rje slob dpon chen po rtog ge pa'i gtsug gi
T02D1419:318a-40: nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla med pa snying
T02D1419:318a-41: rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i dang tshul can phyogs
T02D1419:318a-42: sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos
T02D1419:318a-43: dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad ba
T02D1419:318a-44: sh'akya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang
T02D1419:318a-45: / bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya sang+ge'i dge slong chos kyi yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
T02D1419:318a-47: // / yul dang zas spyod mi mthun pas //
T02D1419:318a-48: phung po rgyun du nad kyis gzung //
T02D1419:318a-49: 'on kyang dam chos la sred pas //
T02D1419:318a-50: 'bad pas bsgyur ro skyon mchis na //
T02D1419:318a-51: grub thob kun gyis bzod par mdzod //
T02D1419:318a-52: de las byung ba'i dge ba 'dis //
T02D1419:318a-53: 'jig rten kun gyi mun sel gyur //
